name: Super Mario Flash: Super Mario World Remake
description: A full recreation of the Flash game Super Mario Flash by pouetpu hacked entirety into Super Mario World with improved graphics, music and small updates to the level design to fix up issues with the difficulty.

name: Sanfu
description: A ghost story filled with mystery and investigation.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Tears of the Kingdom Link
description: A mod which makes Link have his abilities from The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom.

name: Succubus Simulator
description: Succubus Simulator is an episodic ongoing visual novel. It is NSFW, very queer, and sex positive. Go in expecting a complete fuckery of gender norms, a bit of plot, an emphasis on consent, and lots of coding bugs. It explores kinks like femdom, pet play, S&M, and more.

name: Fly High
description: Dodge the walls to fly as high as possible!

name: Fashion Friends: Super Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Special Levels with additional levels! New levels! New adventures! New fun!

name: Blockdude
description: Blokdude is a remake of the well known TI Caluculator game from Brandon Sterner as well as the blockman game from Soleau Software. This version of the game is based on the GP2X port of blockdude.

name: Arcadia: Colony
description: Enter into the world of Arcadia, a 2.5D Anime-style Metroidvania. Play as the three unique characters with their unique abilities and world's interactions. Save your homeland from the troubles caused by the huge bird-like Puppets and reveal hidden truths in the underground!

name: Dual Chroma: Haereticus
description:
As a scribe, you serve in subterranean tombs. You once adored a different version of Him before His transformation. Now, as He calls you to the Cerean Hall, how will you respond?

A glimpse into the shadows of Aradal ages past. Haereticus is short experience set in the Dual Chroma universe made for OA2A jam.

name: Drift City
description: Drift City is a retro arcade racing game that lets the player race around a slalom track in a sports car. Test different cars and collect power ups to set faster times each lap.

name: Crossroads: What Was Lost - Collector's Edition
description: When Eden struggles to find direction after a devastating loss, Crossroads and bartender Mistress Eve appear just in the nick of time! Eden's love of fairy tales and legends makes these three spine-tingling fables the perfect way to set them on the right path. So, are you up to the challenge?

name: Spire Horizon: Companion Expansion
description: Traveling alone is not difficult at all, but with a companion to solve loneliness, it could be even better. Shared experiences and lasting memories make the journey more fulfilling. Solo travel offers freedom, while accompanied travel provides companionship.

name: Unnamed Space Idle
description: Destroy endless waves of alien ships that have all but wiped out humanity in this long form, unfolding, sci-fi idle game. Customize your ship with different weapons and defenses to defeat specific enemy types and utilize a ton of different systems to increase your overall power.

name: Snapback
description: Snapback is a Speed-Runner Puzzle Platformer set in a robot dystopia where you are recruited to rebel against the evil GovCorp overlords, break the rules, and join the resistance!

name: Nautical Dispute
description: Retro nostalgic big voyage game, dream back to the road of great voyage! Exploration, management, trade, piracy and war are constant topics. With wisdom and luck, gradually build a powerful fleet. Set sail, take the Golden Silk Road again, and reproduce the great voyage!

name: Fingernail Floss
description: A short spooky-fun visual novel where you are a special guest for a special test! Is death a game to you? Do you like color schemes that involve the color black?

name: Sex Rhythm: Onsen
description: Sex Rhythm: Onsen is a rhythm game where you getting affection from girls. 3 colleagues came to your hotel, a distant hotel, for a vacation, considering how tired they are in your hands, how they will spend this vacation. Good or bad.

name: Elysium Trials
description: Skill-based Fantasy Shooter on rails with an Epic touch, how you defeat enemies matter! Shoot, unleash powerful lightning magic, and Dragons, beware of dragons as you battle through 8 unique enemies all with unique attacks in vastly different worlds with an epic fantasy rock/metal soundtrack.

name: Raccoon Adventure
description: In this thrilling simulation game, you get to experience life through the eyes of an adorable and cunning raccoon. Explore a bustling suburban neighborhood filled with countless opportunities for adventure, mischief, and plenty of snacks to scavenge!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Summer Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Weaponry Upgrade and Elite Arsenal with:
- PIS-30-ARM pistol: a reliable sidearm
- FMS-1-LEO rifle: a versatile and adaptable rifle for any situation
- SN-1000-FUT sniper rifle: a state-of-the-art weapon with cutting-edge features for ultimate accuracy
- RVL-357-WES pistol: a classic revolver with a timeless design
- BK-47-CAM rifle: a rugged and reliable rifle inspired by the old west
- SN-1100-TRI sniper rifle: a modern-day cowboy sniper rifle

name: Dino World
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey into a world where the heavens themselves tremble under the majestic wings of mythical beasts.

name: Civic Story
description: When a sudden election rocks the country, whose side are you on? In Civic Story, you'll encounter colourful characters and situations that show how the upcoming election affects you, your colleagues, and the nation in this satirical and insightful 8-chapter Visual Novel about our world today.

name: Fantasy Amusement Park
description: Gameplay introduction This is a casual elimination + Visual Novel game, players need to fight against different bosses, and seal different levels in the amusement park location, escape from the amusement park

name: Folcroft Monastery
description: You've been hired by an outfit known as SMS Group to retrieve an artifact lost somewhere inside the abandoned Folcroft Monastery. Locals say the place is haunted by restless spirits, but the pay was too good to pass up. You asked little questions. Find the artifact requested and get out alive.

name: I Commissioned Some Unicorns
description: I paid more artists to hide unicorns and wands in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: The Deadlands
description: The Deadlands, is a haunting journey of vengeance. Conquer undead horrors, face formidable bosses, and harness their souls to save your son from an evil necromancer. Pixel art meets gothic aesthetic in this intense, captivating metroidvania.

name: WestHalla
description: A squad-based strategy RPG set in an alternate old west. Build your crew and manage their skills and equipment as you fight your way through bandits and beasts alike in a procedurally-generated valley to reach the promised land of WestHalla.

name: Imaginary Girl: Sequel
description: The future art will be drawn by two people... Platonic love? Drawing? Adventure game? A continuation of the "Prequel".

name: Working Hard Collection
description: Command a construction project or sabotage it? Your choice!

name: Autumn Hike
description: Prepare to be captivated by the magic of nature as you embark on an unforgettable autumn journey. Are you ready to experience the beauty and serenity of the autumn forest in Autumn Hike? Lace up your boots and step into the adventure today!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Weishan
description: Experience the scorching heat of the season with Weishan's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Zhurong
description: As the saying goes, the pool noodle is mightier than the sword. With noodle in hand, she shows opponents that a playful spirit can still pack a punch, leaving them soaked and defeated in her wake!

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Ashani
description: Get ready to bring the heat to the summer battles with Ashani's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt.

name: Rushdown Revolt: Pool Party Seth
description: Dive into the refreshing waves of victory with Seth's Pool Party skin in Rushdown Revolt!

name: Sex in the Sky
description: Sex in the Sky - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Hello Kitty Island Adventure
description: A cozy life sim/adventure hybrid featuring Hello Kitty and Friends. Create a unique, Sanrio-style original avatar and befriend iconic Sanrio characters like Kuromi, Badtz-Maru, Cinnamoroll, Chococat, and Aggretsuko. Share gifts, complete quests, and take part in island activities to deepen your bonds. Spruce up cabins to attract new visitors from among Hello Kitty’s many friends. Create a stylish wardrobe all your own, solve mysterious puzzles, cook delectable recipes, collect friendly critters, and fish, and explore the island solo or with a friend to unearth the many secrets of a massive in-game world.

name: You're My Penguin
description: Help Jun, a self described "chronic over-thinker" make decisions at his new school with friends, conflicts, and romance in this Shounen-ai, anime style, coming of age story! This game offers a visual gallery with over 35 art to unlock, beautiful scenery, music, visual effects, and sound effects!

name: The Shell Part I: Inferno
description:
The secrets of a case from six years prior may just be the key to the current unending cycle of tragedy, and the thing that cracks this woeful world’s shell may be one girl’s smile.

The Shell Part I: Inferno is the Steam release of the visual novel set in the Showa era, depicting the story of a detective who receives a request from a young girl and uncovers the secret hidden within her.

name: Terminal 81
description: Thanks to the financial crisis of 2008, Lorena migrated to Terminal 81 to work, but what seemed like a simple Latin American neighborhood, it was a dangerous region dominated by a mysterious criminal organization that carries out murders, kidnappings and human trafficking.

name: Swapshot
description: In Swapshot, you take control of this fearless protagonist, equipped with an incredible teleportation gun. Your mission is to overcome a series of challenges in a world filled with 2D platforms and intriguing puzzles.

name: Roboden
description: Roboden is an asymmetrical indirect control real-time strategy game about robot colonies.

name: Grab the Goblins!
description: Grab the Goblins! is a charming hidden object game where you need to find tiny goblins to stop them running amok!

name: IAlly
description: iAlly is a mystery-action game that you can play alone or with 3 friends. Are you ready to feel like a time traveler by solving unique puzzles in a museum full of artifacts from the real world?

name: Antkeep
description: A 2D ant tower defense strategy game, upgrade the ants' abilities to let them spread out and prevent the invasion of red fire ants.

name: Goblin Down
description: An adult visual novel with a fantasy, goblin, and NTR/netorare (cheating) theme.

name: Octavio Camacho
description:
Based on the online graphic novel. This story takes place in a world filled with science gone mad, old society class revived, and a secret contest to possess
the chalice of Exon. To set the world right Octavio Camacho and his covert task- force named W.A.R.C.O.M are ready to take on the mission.

name: Demonic Supremacy
description: Demonic Supremacy is an old school 3D shooter with a certain nostalgic flavour and few gamer-friendly features. It offers several hours of hurricane gameplay rocking through memorable levels with the explosive heavy metal soundtrack!

name: Pseudoregalia
description: Sybil finds herself in a distorted castle and must find her own way out. Grow strong and unlock new abilities to build up a deep movement system, fight enemies, find secrets, and uncover the mysteries of Castle Sansa.

name: Xanthiom Zero
description: Play as Captain Grisham, as he uncovers the secrets of Planet Zord in this thrilling prequel to Side Scape!

name: Mega City Force
description: Retrowave Action Roguelike featuring tough agents battling crime to the electrifying music of artists like Droid Bishop, Timecop1983, and more! Choose your agent and dive into hardcore action against enemies and bosses, utilizing a vast arsenal and special abilities that will define your playstyle

name: Natsu-Mon: 20th Century Summer Kid
description: Natsu-Mon! 20-seiki no Natsu-yasumi is an adventure game where you spend a summer as a boy. Catch insects, fish, swim in the sea, and interact with the towns people. You can also travel to neighboring towns by train and participate in festivals at night. By experiencing various things, the things you can do and the places you can go will expand.

name: Rabat Protocol: Metal Rhapsody
description: Join the guerrilla and take down the enemies on your vehicle in this 3D third-person shooting game! Gain EXP and upgrades by defeating enemies, choose new weapons and combat skills. Use gold gained from battles to buy tactical packs and combine them into your own combo and beat the enemies!

name: Danger Cliff
description: It's a 2D Collectathon! Pull of crazy stunts with the directional cone rush and other moves as you blast through huge levels with unique sets of mechanics and visual style!

name: Tricky Tracks
description: Tricky Tracks is a fun and exciting multiplayer hide & seek game with a twist: As a Runner, you leave footprints! Handle them cleverly and confuse your chasers while you're running and hiding. Or as a Seeker: Don't let them fool you!

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Collector's Edition
description:
The Rumble Fish 2: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of The Rumble Fish 2 game with download codes for 3 characters and The Rumble Fish 1 game
- Collector's Edition Box
- Soundtrack
- Art Book
- Strategy Guide and Command List

name: Sinned
description: Sinned is a fast-paced retro FPS game situated within the darkest depths of hell where you will fight demonic legions and Pandemonius, Lord of Hell himself!

name: Disney Illusion Island
description: Join Mickey & Friends on a quest to explore the mysterious island of Monoth and recover three mystical books to save the world from disaster! Choose your favorite character and unlock special abilities as you perform high-flying platforming feats, solve fun puzzles, and take on epic boss battles. Run, swim, swing, and jump your way through a beautiful yet mysterious island and discover rich biomes, intriguing characters, and hidden secrets!

name: Undaunted Normandy
description: Play the acclaimed World War 2 deck-building game. Use your cards to seize the initiative, bolster your forces, or control your troops on the battlefield. You will face intense resistance, machine gun fire, and mortar bombardment, but a great commander can turn the situation to their advantage!

name: The Master's Pupil
description: The Master’s Pupil is a hand painted puzzle adventure game set inside the eye of an artist.

name: Astro Battlers TD
description: Kids land on a promising planet but so did dangerous furballs! Who wins? Astro Battlers TD is an up-and-coming roguelite deck building Lane Defense game with permanent and trap upgrades, level builder, dynamic defender, ultimates and challenges! Become an Astro Battler!

name: 13: Origin - Chapter One
description: Unknowingly revealing a great secret about human history, will Edmond be able to live with this secret? 13:ORIGIN is a story-based adventure and puzzle game full of suspense and excitement, where you can progress by solving puzzles. Here is the first chapter of the journey.

name: For Your Information
description: First person team multiplayer game. On closed map, battle between Guards and Spies. Spies team need to find locked filling cabinet and documents with parts of the password. Guards team need to find Spies, judging on the basis of spy movement or behavior.

name: Rusa Odyssey
description: RUSA Odyssey is an exploration game set in the post-apocalypse world. Alone, a deer journey to find a way out of the MAZE. discover stories & mysteries along the way.

name: Woodfel
description: Welcome to Woodfel! This untamed fantasy land is yours to explore as you go forth in search of adventure. Discover treasures, fight monsters and build amazing things as you and your friends travel the landscape!

name: Concluse 2: The Drifting Prefecture
description: Concluse 2 is an atmospheric horror game which takes place immediately after the events of Concluse. It holds to the atmosphere of the first while introducing combat and more..

name: Magical DoReMi: Puzzle Carnival
description: Experience the officially licensed Japanese IP Magical DoReMi match-3 mobile game! Customize your character with hairstyles, outfits, and accessories, freely explore the village, and solve puzzles by clearing crystals and obstacles on the game board. Earn coins and items as you progress. Enjoy stress-free gameplay while giving your brain a fun workout. Dive into the magical charm of Magical DoReMi today!

name: One Life: Parkour Project
description: Are you looking for a REAL parkour game but haven't found anything? One Life - Parkour Project is the one for you! Relax, headphones up, customize your character and do parkour... EVERYWHERE!

name: Mega Man X5: Improvement Project Addendum
description: Sin descripción

name: Bingo Beavers: Bathroom
description: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Bathroom.

name: Bingo Beavers: Kitchen
description: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Kitchen.

name: Run from the Light
description:
Have you ever wondered about what lies in the dark?
Have you ever thought about the mysteries that belong in the darkness and the shadows?
Well if you have I don't have the answer for that, but in "Run from the Light" you become one with the shadows, only to come across light spots falling from the sky! Don't let them touch you, otherwise, the darkness will not be happy and absorb you entirely.

name: Trivia Beta64 Party
description: A Modification of Jackbox Games' Trivia Murder Party 2 - Inspired by the lore and community of Beta64, featuring overhauled voiceovers, music, trivia, and graphics.

name: Reverse 1999: A Nightmare at Green Lake
description:
Version 1.2 of Reverse: 1999, which includes:

• New characters: Tooth Fairy, Jessica, Blonney, and Horropedia

• New Garments for X, Sotheby, Bkornblume, and Eagle

• New main event: A Nightmare At Green Lake

• …and more!

name: Tuiterland 4
description:
Explore the vast region of 4chan, discover all of its secrets and discover new and extravagant characters in this new entry of the Tuiterland saga! Tuiterland 4 has a clear distinction from the rest of the series: we don't visit Twitter at any time!

Even though it only has one playable region, 4chan is the vastest region of the Social Network Contintent, as it was revealed in Tuiterland 3 and Tuiterland 0rigins, so there's no need to worry about not having enough places to explore!

What mysteries will you find? What unpredictable situations will happen? How is the story connected to the other entries? All of this and much more will be discovered in this new entry, the new generation of the Tuiterland saga!

Tuiterland 4 has been developed to be the ultimate Tuiterland experience, being the game with most story cutscenes, lots of side content in terms of stories and map exploration and the most refined combat system. We hope you like it!

The game can be played on Android using the free emulator "JoiPlay" available on Google Play Store, but slight visual glitches may appear.

name: Tuna Rice
description: Tuna Rice is a silly little VN about warm and fluffy... tuna rice !

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 1: Archer's Paradox
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: Only Down
description: Only Down is a platform jumping parkour game. It is produced by the independent studio OldCat Digital Studio, with a single person named OldCat. Only Down, as the name suggests, means players move from the sky to the ground or below, ultimately obtaining the treasure.

name: Warframe: Echoes of Duviri
description:
This update adds Wisp Prime along with her signature weapons Fulmin Prime and Gunsen Prime. These additions replace Nidus Prime, Strun Prime and Magnus Prime which have now been added to the Prime Vault.

Other additions include a new drifter melee weapon Argo & Viel, new Undercroft tiles with a Jackal assassination mission, 5 new Incarnon weapons, 4 new Warframe augment mods, 4 new Duviri decrees, and a Duviri dojo room that allows you to free roam on the Harbinger’s Pass and Courtier’s Bliss islands.

name: Femdemic
description:
Lead an alien bacterial race that induces male to female body transformations, one cell at a time. But as the new women embrace their bodies, the politicians close in… Femdemic is a witty, trans-affirming idle clicker with two story paths that explore gender, happiness, and femininity:

Liberation is a wholesome, trans-affirming story for the LGBTQIA2+-Audience.. Lead a benevolent mission to give each trans woman the body she needs. Increasing your hosts’ self-love is crucial to success. But beware politicians as they attempt to lock down this trans awakening …

Compliance is a feminization-fetish story for kinkster players. Your alien bacterial race spreads to new hosts through sex, but there’s a catch - All natural-born Earth women are immune. The solution: Transform infected males into new females! Change each male host into a sexy female one - then encourage them to mate and spread the infection. Operation Feminize Earth has begun.

name: Hayarigami 2: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayarigami 3: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Hayarigami: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: Sin descripción

name: Counter Delta 2: Eastern Crisis
description:
War clouds begin to gather over the Eastern European region. A single-player TPS game that fights against terrorists around the world!
“Counter Delta 2: Eastern Crisis”is a solo single player/Third-Person Shooter.
Team up with our soldiers to complete the battlefield mission.
Enjoy a thrilling TPS game with a diverse play mode and various weapons that can be unlocked by leveling up.

name: Hyper Torque Racing
description:
Be the wind on the circuit! A real racer experience with simple visuals! That's Hyper Torque Racing.
Move the kart with just the accelerator, brake, and steering wheel. The simplified driving operations give you a deep, authentic racer experience you can enjoy.

name: Mechanic 8230: Escape From Ilgrot - Extended Edition
description:
Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.
Even the tiniest coin can prove vital in this adventure. Remember – the only weapon at your disposal is your mind!

name: The Scientists' Secret: Hidden Object Game
description: Can you find all the differences in the scenes? Discover them to unveil the mysteries of the scientists, only then you will know what has happened in their research.

name: Windstorm: Double Pack
description:
Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship
Discover the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she tries to befriend the black stallion called Windstorm.

Windstorm: An Unexpected Arrival
Experience the story of Ari as she arrives in the Alpine area and quickly befriends Windstorm. Together they will go on exciting horse riding adventures and discover the true meaning of friendship!

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - The Makeover Collection
description:
Contents:
-Cosmetics set (Magical Makeup, Hair Catalog)
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
-Luxury Wedding Attire Set ( White, Pink, Blue )
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.

name: Lovecraftian Bundle
description: Immerse yourself in the terrifying universe of H.P. Lovecraft with this bundle.

name: Settlement Survival: Tourism
description: Settlement Survival: Tourism contains a whole new tourism system, with 9 attraction structures and 10 commercial structures. You can earn Silver Coins and Access Points from tourists, and increase Town Attractiveness to bring more tourists immigrating to your town.

name: For Honor: Ocelotl Hero
description: Embody the Ocelotl, hunter on the battlefield, and defeat enemies with your macuahuitl and tepoztopilli.

name: Arcade Archives: Growl
description:
"GROWL" is an action game released by TAITO in 1990.
Choose one of the four rangers to control and save the animals from the evil poachers.
Use weapons you can pick up along the way, such as swords, guns, and rocket launchers, as well as a variety of techniques that you can perform by combining buttons to defeat the poachers.

name: Nyomi Wants a Job!
description: The greater being Nyomi wants a job in order to upgrade their form!

name: Cuties
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Nova Strike
description: Fire up your blaster cannons and take on waves of enemies in this retro shoot'em up with procedural levels. Come back stronger with each attempt and beat the high score!

name: Match War
description: Match War - This is a simple match-3 plus war game. The game has three ways to play: pass, defeat, and hold on. Players need to change the soldiers or heroes who fight to win.

name: Tank Storage
description:
Drive a car, shoot the gun with operating a tank and sometimes walk.
2D top down combat vehicles shooter and adventure game

name: Cabin of Shadows: Dueling Impostors
description: You and one other survivor have escaped to an abandoned cabin in the woods after your village was attacked by a werewolf. Is the person before you truly human? Or could your sole companion be the very same monster that slaughtered everyone you know?

name: Grandpa's House
description: A Short Indie Still and fast-paced Horror Game. Hide your games from Grandpa and survive 7 rounds!

name: The Old House
description: A little story about returning to The Old House.

name: 3 Minutes Mystery
description:
Immerse yourself in the thrilling role of a detective with easy controls in this mystery game.
Discover concealed evidence within intricate illustrations and uncover the truth behind each case!
While the illustrations may appear straightforward at first glance, gathering the depicted evidence and solving the mysteries will genuinely challenge your wits.

name: Le Avventure di Blue: Lacrima di Cristallo
description: Discover the story of the best-loved characters from 'The Adventures of Blue'. Experience the adventure as the young thief Krystal and the beautiful Princess. Explore the game world and complete various missions while saving the Glacid Kingdom.

name: Minigame Party
description: Enjoy 13 minigames at once! MiniGame Party. Various minigames and unique characters are just a download away! Tap to play anytime, anywhere!

name: Hamboy: AutoChess Survivor
description: Hamboy is a rogue-like arena shooting game where you fight against aliens by strategically combining 12 attributes and 10 types of weapons to create synergies. As the waves increase, you'll realize that you shouldn't spend gold recklessly.

name: KnightMan
description: Knight Man is a 2d Pixel-art retro style platformer. Play As Knightman, a heroic warrior who has taken it upon himself to save the 5 realms from the clutches of evil. Traverse through 20 hand-crafted levels across 5 unique zones, each populated by a variety of enemies and hazards.

name: Makabaka
description: This is a third-person pronoun grass cutting game, a unique magic girl theme game, with the background set in a mysterious autumn forest. The player will play the role of a magical girl with a natural magical talent, facing the threat of ghoul appearing in the forest

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Desuhiko: Charisma Killed the Cat
description: The first DLC for Master Detective Archives: RAIN CODE is a substory that features protagonist Desuhiko Thunderbolt, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Disguise."

name: Alien War 2 DogFight
description: The best shooting game with various perspectives.

name: Zombie Hunter: D-Day
description: The apocalypse is here. Zombies flood in from all sides. You have 80 days until the rescue team arrives. Your desperate struggle for survival begins now!

name: Psychic 5: Eternal
description:
"Five heroes with super powers, five hammers saving the world."
"At that time, Satan was not completely dead."

name: Lethal Operation: Episode 1 - Healer Rugitta
description: キャラをじっくり育てながら広い世界を冒険する――。 そんなSTGがあってもいいじゃないか!! …というのがこのゲームのコンセプト。 ブレイクによって敵弾を消すことができ、 レベルと装備で強くなるので、STGが苦手な人でも凶悪弾幕ボスを間違いなく倒せるようになります!

name: Last Bloody Snack
description: Last Bloody Snack tells the story of a boy named Cody, who suffers from severe psychological disorders and has visions of a monster that will try to eliminate everything he hates. The game explores a strong theme, focusing on maternal responsibility.

name: Lim Beyond One-on-One Basketball
description: LiM Beyond One-on-One Basketball - In a nutshell, the game involves two pads and bouncing the ball to hit the opponent's basket. You can win or lose, and there's even an arcade mode that's crazy-crazy. The game's simplistic setup makes it suitable for players of all skill levels and ages.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition brings together all five ground-breaking episodes of The Expanse: A Telltale Series along with Telltale's bonus episode “Archangel".

“Archangel" is a brand new chapter in the saga and sees Shohreh Aghdashlooyou returning as fan-favorite Chrisjen Avasarala, a canny operator who must out-maneuver political adversaries and deal with personal emotions while fighting to protect the planet during her early career as Under-Secretary for Peace Operations, an organization formed to defend earth from impending danger.

name: F1 Manager 2023: Deluxe Edition
description: The intense world of Formula 1 comes alive for a new season in F1 Manager 2023. 23 races, six F1 Sprint events, new cars, new circuits including the Las Vegas street circuit, new drivers, new challenges… Your legacy begins here.

name: Spacejump
description: An unnamed undercover policeman is given a new task, to destroy all aliens on a secret planet.

name: Double Dragon Gaiden: Rise of the Dragons
description:
Prepare to throw down the Double Dragon way in this fresh addition to the iconic beat ‘em up franchise.

Explore the early beginnings of the young Double Dragon brothers as they take on both new and familiar enemies in this alternate story. In this fresh roguelite take, every playthrough is brand new chance at new action. Featuring a unique and dynamic level structure, the difficulty of the missions you take on will change depending on the order you have selected them.

Tag in and out as the classic duo Billy and Jimmy, switch it up with Marian and Uncle Matin, or experiment with 9 additional unlockable characters, each with their own special moves and unique playstyles. With 2 player local co-op, the action quadruples as you and a friend clean up the mean streets.

name: Hayarigami 1, 2, 3 Pack
description: Hayarigami 1-2-3 Pack is a horror visual novel game that includes Hayarigami: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File, Hayarigami 2: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File, and Hayarigami 3: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File game.

name: Revenge of the Shadow Ninja
description: Platform game with a gloomy artistic style. Challenging levels with many traps and enemies. Use all your skills to avoid dangerous traps. Destroy all opponents on your way to revenge.

name: DeepOne
description: Naoya and his twin sister Konoka had lost their parents at a young age and had a tough childhood. Nevertheless they still managed to find happiness in the little things in life and wished that these warm peaceful days would last forever. However, this faint hope was mercilessly crushed when a Grimoire suddenly appeared before them. It is a forbidden magic book that has existed since the beginning of time, but which should not be in the human realm. They thought that they were an ordinary family, but they were actually the heirs to the “Old One”, which has the power to destabilize the world.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: On the Farm
description: Join us on a journey to the countryside and indulge in the joyful and peaceful world of farming

name: Access Denied: Escape
description: Access Denied: Escape is a puzzle game where you have to hack data vaults and interact with various devices to escape.

name: Crymachina
description: Crymachina is an action RPG where mechanical girls strive to survive in a post-apocalyptic world to become “Real Humans''. But what does it mean to be a “Real Human”?

name: Origins
description: Origins is a playable short created by the team at Inworld AI to showcase NPCs powered by artificial intelligence. After an explosion in Metropolis, you’ve arrived on the scene as the lead detective. Question witnesses, uncover the mystery, and solve the case. From the creator of The Matrix Awakens

name: Let's School
description: This is a casual school-building game, you are entrusted by your old headmaster with the glorious task of reviving your alma mater. As the new principal, you will not only need to build a stylized school, but also train teachers, recruit students, run clubs, create your ideal personalized academy.

name: Grand Emprise: Time Travel Survival
description: Time travel through history to become god. Ride dinosaurs, forge tools, sail dunes, build a colony, siege castles, and automate & fly in the industrial revolution. An insane unforgettable and revolutionary survival crafting base building open world adventure.

name: PixelJunk: Scrappers Deluxe
description: Clean up the streets of Junktown as a team of robot garbage collectors. Trash your opponents with up to 4 players or go it alone in this beat ‘em up that’s also a clean ‘em up!

name: Delivery INC
description: Delivery INC is a fast-paced time management game where you’ll be challenged with quick decision making and planning. Build a fleet of vehicles and drivers. Pick up deliveries and drop them off as quickly as possible. Put your logic and delivery skills to the test in any real-world city.

name: Disfigure
description: Disfigure is a top-down shooter rogue-lite in which you fight countless grotesque creatures shrouded in darkness. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique builds each run and survive.

name: Deadlink
description: Deadlink is a cyberpunk FPS with roguelite elements. You're the first operative to be recruited to the experimental Deadlink project. Pilot an autonomous combat shell, fighting your way through cramped slums, twisted labs, grimy warehouses, and sleek office buildings on a mission to thwart the schemes of the most powerful corporations in the world. Wield a deadly arsenal, upgrade your skills and tech, devastate destructible environments, and slash corporate profit margins — all at the same time.

name: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara
description: Join Koa and her best friend Napopo on an action-packed adventure through the islands of Mara! Outwit traps, manoeuvre dangerous environments, and explore a series of dazzlingly different landscapes on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.

name: Rightfully, Beary Arms
description: Rightfully, Beary Arms is a bullet hell roguelite that is about more than collecting loot, dying, and then losing everything. Carefully choose enemy upgrades against your own. Plan your dungeon crawl tactfully to gun through unique factions of enemies and strategically preserve loot after death.

name: The Future Project
description: Take control of an AI soldier, explore planets, and partake in fast paced combat in The Future Project, a first person metroidvania. Explore distinct worlds, obtain new weapons and abilities, and defeat powerful enemies in humanity's quest to journey the stars.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series
description: In the near future on the outskirts of the asteroid belt, a bloody mutiny breaks loose on the Artemis. You take the role of XO Camina Drummer, where your choices determine the fate of the ship. What will you do with the truth, Bosmang?

name: Komorebi
description: Komorebi is a coming-of-age/slice of life story about a group of friends who happen to experience visions of their future; and the fears and anxieties they face as they try to find their own way in a life that may be predestined. From Klace, critically acclaimed creator of Winds of Change.

name: Endlight
description: Break through and outlast shifting, twisting, chaos. Fly through surreal landscapes desperately trying to get hoops. Dodging is impossible, so start smashing.

name: Stone Story RPG
description: In a realm of perpetual evil, a single stone could change everything. Stone Story is an RPG set in a dark and vile world. The game's fluid art is painstakingly animated in plain text by a single insane game developer. It features 8 locations to explore, 8 boss fights and plenty of loot to discover.

name: Lunacy: Saint Rhodes
description: Lunacy: Saint Rhodes is a first-person survival horror game. Explore your dark family history and experience a gut-wrenching feeling of terror. You are being watched; never alone, never safe.

name: Arcadian Atlas
description:
Arcadian Atlas is a 2D isometric tactical RPG about the choices people make in pursuit of the things they love, and the havoc it wreaks on a kingdom.

Watch your footing and mind the strategic vantage points as you traverse the richly detailed pixel art world of Arcadia — a single misstep on the battlefield could cost you a friend’s life. Let the moody jazz soundtrack carry you through a thought provoking & ruthless story of love, deceit, murder, companionship and war. Meant to be a fresh take on the classic strategy RPG style, Arcadian Atlas was designed from the ground up to incorporate more challenging battle strategies, new & balanced job classes, and more cutthroat plot twists that'll leave these complex characters' lives hanging in the balance.

Featuring dynamic job classes, a rich character driven narrative, strategic grid-based battles and a jazz infused soundtrack, Arcadian Atlas is a lushly handcrafted 2D isometric tactical RPG that takes the rich history of the genre and makes it fresh.

name: Undying: Reject
description: A short visual novel in which a vampire offers his help

name: Crime Boss: Rockay City - Tactical Weapon Pack
description:
Up your strategy game with the first Tactical Weapon Pack for Crime Boss: Rockay City, including the following firearms:

• Slate 36: A semi-automatic rifle which will help you taking over Rockay City!
• Fiver Tactical: This handgun is a beauty of its own and will be with you until the end.
• Bohema: Who does not like an automatic pistol, which you can easily sneak into any bank?
• Urban Sweeper: Do you need to win an argument on the streets? This shotgun will be your best friend!

name: Skibidi Friends
description: Skibidi Friends is a co-op puzzle platformer based on the Skibidi Toilet meme.

name: Space Pizza
description: Satisfy all your space ship punching needs.

name: Heavenly Bodies: Cleanup
description:
Set in and around a vast new space station across 7 days, the Cleanup DLC tasks you to deal with the aftermath of the catastrophic events that took place in the Heavenly Bodies.

Equipped with an array of fancy new tools and devices, you’ll have to repair your debris-damaged station and dispose of hazardous scrap.

Explore a huge new area with the ‘Piloted Manoeuvring Unit’ or ‘PMU’ to collect information to determine what went so wrong in the previous mission.

name: VenusBlood Gaia International
description: Embark on the impossible quest to rescue the decaying world of Palastra in this dungeon defense SRPG, interwoven with a story of epic proportions!

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Tail Concerto Costume Pack
description:
A dramatic simulation RPG depicting a pursuit rife with hope and despair!

This costume pack features the 12 children in police officer and sky pirate attire.
You can modify what the children are wearing under "Costumes" in the Options menu.

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Definitive Edition
description:
Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

You play as multiple characters, each with their own story, and travel to actual locations in town and dark versions of them.
In this nightmare, you have to solve the murder, search for your missing sister Sarah, and complete the mysterious ritual to save the dying town. Will you be able to unravel all the dark secrets of Boreal Tenebrae?

name: Shadowblade Odyssey
description:
"Shadowblade Odyssey" is an enchanting 2D platform adventure game that draws inspiration from the classic retro Shadow style. Embark on a thrilling journey through a mysterious phantasmal world, where players take on the role of a young hero.

In this game, players must skill fully evade cunningly placed traps and employ their mastery of blades and darts to vanquish enemies. However, combat is not the only approach; players can also learn potent shapeshifting abilities to conceal themselves within the shadows, quietly elude adversaries, and seek out hidden treasures.

Players can exchange their hard-earned currency to acquire new abilities, upgrade their existing skills, and unlock powerful enhancements for their character. Whether it's improving the effectiveness of their blades and darts, extending the duration of their shapeshifting ability, or acquiring unique and rare skills.

name: One Button Games 5-in-1
description:
Challenge yourself with these 5 one-button fast-paced games.

In "B Cannon" you are moving around the screen and can reverse your direction by pressing a button. Your goal is to shoot the circles that are bouncing around. You aim automatically and shoot at the current aim position. Hold a button to shoot. The circles break up into smaller ones and you have to shoot them until they can no longer be broken down. The game is over when you touch any circle.

In "Cate P" you score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar. The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

In "S Lanes" You are constantly moving between the four lanes on the left side of the screen. Your goal is to shoot enemies that are coming from the right to keep them from reaching the lanes. Hold a button to shoot and to move forward towards the enemies. Collect the coins that enemies drop after you destroy them to score points. The game is over when any enemy reaches any of the lanes.

In "Thunder" you are running in the middle of a thunderstorm. Collect the stars that form when lightning strikes the ground to score points. But avoid getting hit by lightning. Reverse your direction by pressing a button or by hitting the sides of the screen. The game is over when you get struck.

In "UD Cave" your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points. The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human - The Walking Dead Bundle
description: Embody the spirit of resourceful leader Rick Grimes or grab one of the most iconic weapons out there. Oh, and don't forget, even though it's pretty obvious, “If it's dead, then kill it!”.

name: Detective Solitaire: Butler Story 3
description: Get in the middle of an investigation! Solitaire solitaire puzzles and train your mind!

name: PriPri
description: "PriPri" is an ADV game where you explore maps, interact with characters, and uncover an escape plan as a prison staff member. Choose to befriend female prisoners and aid in the escape or ignore it, all while enjoying a relaxed gameplay experience without quest markers or time limits.

name: Ava's Adventure
description: Ava's Adventure is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of Ava who has been chosen as a test subject for the secret CRR Corp. experiment in order to help him overcome his social anxiety and fulfill his desires.

name: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium
description: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium is a rhythm game for iOS and Android.

name: Boomeraxe
description: Who says a twin-stick shooter needs guns? Boomeraxe is a bullet hell dungeon crawler with a unique core mechanic: Your only weapon hurts you too.

name: For Enigma
description: Expanda, negocie, destrua inimigos, forje um império sobre o espaço!

name: Meteor Crusher
description: Sin descripción

name: Samurai Kento
description: Play as Kento, an Elder Samurai, and face the evil Yokai in this 2D pixelated mini action RPG set in Feudal Japan based scenarios!

name: Cyber Assault
description: Welcome to the world of Cyber Assault, an exhilarating top-down shooter in the Japanese style, set in a mysterious Japanese mountain monastery.

name: Sex Simulator: Yoga Class
description: A steamy sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition images and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an instructor who shows his clients the sexual benefits of practicing yoga.

name: Only Down!
description: Have game developers often forced you to climb somewhere with no purpose? This time, your goal is to hit rock bottom and nothing else. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

name: The Gravity Trickster
description: Defy gravity and traverse tricky 3D platforms and mind-bending challenges as you navigate your robot to the end of each level, collecting keys, coins, cosmic cubes and more as you go!

name: Elite Status: Platinum Concierge
description: Find the unfindable and do the impossible? It’s all in a day’s work for you. As a concierge, how far will you go to make billionaires’ dreams come true?

name: Murder at the House
description: 11 people trapped in an old abandoned house together. 8 Innocents. One Detective. One Murderer. You are either the murderer or detective. You must interrogate suspects and find clues in order to solve the mystery, before it is too late.

name: Great Ambition of the Slimes
description: A tactical simulation game where you make slimes take over humans to fight your battles! You have weak, weak slimes under your command. But what if they have the ability to occupy human bodies? Lend your wisdom to the slimes and help them take over the world!

name: Native Hunter
description: Inspired by an existing indigenous tribe, where they live on an island called "North Sentinel Island". Native Hunter gives the player the possibility of living the experience in the body of an indigenous person completely isolated from society, just like the Sentinelese do.

name: Probo Rush
description: Probo Rush is a classic shoot 'em up bullet hell game with a boss rush twist. Fight against machines, aliens, and nature as you take on ten challenging boss battles. With adjustable health and an Assist Mode, Probo Rush offers a challenging but accessible gaming experience.

name: Tower of God: New World
description: Will you answer the call of the Tower?

name: Brixity
description: Build your world in an all new sandbox adventure to construct magnificent buildings that will become the heart and soul of your civilization. Create a city with awe-inspiring structures, from towering skyscrapers to cozy residential homes, each designed with your own unique touch. If you can dream it, you can build it in this world of endless possibilities as you build your own architectural marvels. With over 7000 types of Brix (blocks) available, you can create a city unlike anything ever built. Share your creations with friends and even take inspiration as you visit their city.

name: Super Intern Story
description: Super Intern Story is a fun little adventure about working as a monster in a video game. Wear different costumes, get slain by heroes all while getting yelled at by your boss! Discover the joys of working behind the scene — as an unpaid intern in the game industry!

name: Crypt Underworld
description:
Ten years pass, and its desires are forgotten. They seep into crevices in the earth, where they accumulate and admix, taking on ambiguous new shapes. From these caverns of human experience, where forgotten desires linger, an echo is heard in the world of the living:

Crypt Underworld: The Final Videogame!

name: JR East Train Simulator: Yamanote Line (Osaki to Osaki) E235-0 series
description: The Yamanote Line runs in a circle around the center of Tokyo for 34.5 km, taking 59 minutes, and is one of the major lines in the Tokyo metropolitan area, connecting huge terminal stations with world-class passengers.

name: Penumbra Lane
description: Penumbra Lane is a point-and-click adventure horror game in which you play as a depressed cat-man named Xavier, who is attempting to break the lease for his new apartment.

name: Lost Everything: Chapter 1
description: Embark on an immersive adventure with "Lost Everything: Chapter 1," a captivating 2D point and click game. Join Billy, the determined protagonist, as he delves into a journey of revelation, where the truth awaits, whether he's ready for it or not. Unravel mysteries, solve intriguing puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets in this compelling storyline.

name: Internet Tycoon
description: At the dawn of the Internet Age, could the player take up the role of a dauntless entrepreneur and establish the most successful internet company? When the player becomes CEO, will they still treat their employees well or have a change of heart?

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Competitive Playable Bosses
description: This mod makes the bosses from World of Light playable on standard versus matches.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Amazing Edition
description: This bundle lets you try out the new whiteboard set and drawings.

name: Pokémon Elite Redux
description: Pokemon Elite Redux has a strong focus on increased difficulty and variety in teambuilding. It features up to 4 abilities at the same time while every single Pokemon & Trainer has been rebalanced manually. There are tons of QoL enhancements and zero grinding. It features over 100 new abilities and some new moves for more variety. It's inspired by hacks like Inclement Emerald, Radical Red, but it's unique in the sense of 4 abilities, tons of QoL mixed with manually-created Trainers.

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Special Edition
description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: The Anglerfish Project
description: Use your friendly probe, Paul, to fish for communication packages in the cosmos. Aim at an alteration in the sky and, being careful of your strength, cast your fishing rod. You will need to decrypt these hidden messages to help keep everyone safe. Good luck, angler.

name: Hentai World: Definitive Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Hentai Uni 2
description: Hentai Uni 2 is a sequel to our last year's hit. Luckily, you can still play it with one hand only. In HU2 you'll get to see both old and completely new characters.

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - Spearhead 1944
description: Grab your rifle and prepare to deploy to the fields of Normandy. This new addition will take you back to historic World War II, fighting alongside the US First Army in Normandy, and introduces new vehicles, weapons, clothing, gear, co-op campaign, and more.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 4
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Milk Me Darling: Tits Fairy
description: Milk Me Darling: Tits Fairy (all characters are 18+ and no character get hurt in this video game), sex Simulator where you will be able to penetrate penis to vagina and make a great pleasure to make the vagina squirt

name: Grim Tales: The Time Traveler
description: A time-traveling killer is taking out the Gray family, one by one.

name: Dere. Some Answers Before I...
description: Come back, for no one is waiting for you. Search for your memories - no one ever knew you. Destroy everything in your path - all around you are nothing but ruins. End the endless cycle, for it has long since closed in on itself.

name: Stacklands: Cursed Worlds
description: Cursed Worlds is the first DLC for Stacklands. Travel to three different worlds where the villagers are haunted by tricky curses. Build up their village, then use new cards and card packs to lift the curse! 130+ new cards, 50+ new Quests and 15 new card packs!

name: Rat Catcher
description: Embark on a perilous journey as a fearless rat catcher in this nostalgic 90's-inspired dungeon crawler horror game. Explore dark and treacherous dungeons, facing off against horrifying monsters and collecting an array of eerie rats. Can you survive the darkness and emerge as the ultimate hero?

name: Noonna the Rock
description: 'Noonna the Rock' is a special visual novel game that deals with the special material of death metal and the romance between the heroine 'Noonna' and the Protagonist.

name: Skeljump
description: Experience the puzzle genre from a different perspective in this game! You must solve puzzles that get more complex as you progress by managing time well, using your reflexes and memory to overcome the challenges!

name: Only Climb: Better Together
description: Tired of sitting on the ground? Take a sky-high journey with your friends in Only Climb: Better Together! Touch the clouds with your own hands and find out what's behind them, but remember, there are no easy paths…

name: Jump Tracks
description: Action! Danger! Coins! What more could you want from a game?! Jump Tracks is a game all about timing and reflexes. Zoom off the tracks, clear each level, and try not to die along the way in this tiny and twitchy arcade tapper. It's harder than it looks! Good luck!

name: Prostitute Simulator 2
description: Welcome to the second entry of the best prostitute simulator. In this game you will be able to satisfy your hottest desires. Work as a prostitute, get clients and enjoy amazing anime and realistic porn scenes with stylized 3D models.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Execution Force
description:
Unleash the Emperor’s judgement as a new threat casts a shadow over the galaxy. Execution Force introduces the elite Officio Assassinorum, a secretive, deadly force capable of eliminating high-value targets with surgical precision. Utilise their unparalleled stealth and lethal arsenal to turn the tide of battle as you face a new danger in the form of the Tentarus Hive.

Alongside this, take the fight to the forces of Nurgle as you unleash your strike force into the heart of enemy cruisers in brand-new Boarding Action missions, disabling them and claiming the spoils of victory.

name: Heist Force
description: Single-player 3rd-person action heist game. Infiltrate banks, outmaneuver enemies, execute high-stakes heists. Engage in intense shootouts, utilize diverse weapons, navigate dynamic environments. Can you become the ultimate Heist Force?

name: Hidden SciFi City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Surviving Hunter
description: Welcome to the thrilling adventure of Surviving Hunter, where you will embark on a perilous journey to save your homeland from the clutches of ancient rulers.

name: Supreme Summoner
description: "Supreme Summoner" is a fair online turn-based strategy card game set in the Three Kingdoms era, allowing players to construct their own decks based on various card skills for free battles.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Horsch Agrovation Pack
description: German specialist HORSCH's cultivators, drills, and weeders promise maximum output with minimum effort. Introducing 14 highly-detailed machines and with the recreation of the real AgroVation farm, a new map! The HORSCH AgroVation Pack - maximum efficiency and versatility for fields of all sizes.

name: Worldwide Battle Royale
description: Battle royale game with realistic world maps and characters.

name: Forklift Simulator 2023
description: Start your job in this realistic forklift simulator. Experience realistic controls, intricate maneuvering, and precise cargo handling. Complete missions, master different forklift models, and prove your skills in this immersive simulation game.

name: The Traveller
description: Complete the mission for a secret organization and meet some hot girls and women!

name: Conscience
description: Play as an objective strand of an all knowing hivemind, and guide these lost aliens to by showing them the proper path of morality!

name: The Last Breath
description: Survive the post-apocalypse world. There's a predator who's going after you. This is Online and local party games enjoyed by 1 to 5 players. you have to Survive in an end-of-life world.

name: Artemis Cosmos
description: Cosmos simulates a spaceship bridge of up to six players, guarding your deep space stations against the menacing Kraliens and Torgoth. Immerse yourself in a modern space game with enhanced graphics and endless customization possibilities, guaranteeing countless hours of exhilarating fun.

name: Remnant II: Ultimate Edition
description: Remnant II pits survivors of humanity against new deadly creatures and god-like bosses across terrifying worlds. Play solo or co-op with two other friends to explore the depths of the unknown to stop an evil from destroying reality itself.

name: Remnant II: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The game
- Early Access to 3 sets: (Elder Armor, Radiant Armor, and Void Armor)

name: Dead by Daylight: Nicolas Cage
description: Prepare for a tour de force performance. Dead by Daylight's Nicolas Cage Chapter Pack features a new Survivor, legendary actor Nicolas Cage in his deadliest role yet. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive Cosmetic: Teal Jacket as well as the Very Rare Gorgon Drip outfit for Nicolas Cage.

name: Too Many Sheep
description: Too Many Sheep might be the ultimate sheep herding game. Work together with up to 4 players navigating challenging courses or compete with each other to herd your sheep the fastest. Too Many Sheep offers fun for players of all levels. Will you collaborate or compete? Play Too Many Sheep to find out!

name: Mr. Run and Jump
description: Mr Run and Jump draws you in with precise level design, free-flowing gameplay, and formidable challenge. Silky controls encourage players to run, jump, dash, double jump, and roll to clear levels with style, making it a speedrunner’s dream. Collectibles hidden in tough-to-reach spots demand players use their wits as well as their dexterity. Dynamic Assistance options allow players to set the level of difficulty they want. No matter how you play, Mr Run and Jump offers engaging gameplay options to players of varying skill levels and approaches.

name: Knowledge Fever
description: Knowledge Fever is a quiz game where you are a guy wanting to learn more about everything in the biggest library in the world! But this library holds some nasty secrets only those inside know. . . are you ready to enter there?

name: Wipe Girls 0
description: By wiping the black screen on the pictures, spend wonderful days with four unique girls each with their own flavor~

name: Full Moon Rush
description: Take on a howling challenge in Full Moon Rush! This classic shoot 'em up is a bullet hell masterpiece with a boss rush twist. With 10 epic battles and old-school graphics, you'll need expert shooting skills to survive. Customizable health and Assist Mode make it accessible to all.

name: The Banished Vault
description: A strategy game of exploration, endurance, and space travel on an interstellar gothic monastery. Explore solar systems, harvest resources, construct outposts, and face hazards in the challenging universe of The Banished Vault.

name: Beacon's Bluff
description: Solve unearthly puzzles and become engrossed in this discerning horror mystery story. The Lighthouse is the first in the Story Machine Horror series.

name: Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer
description: "Arms Evolution: Zombie Destroyer" is a unique Roguelite tower defense game. You will slaughter thousands of zombies in the game and enhance your weapon towers through build character in the RPG way. and , the game also offers an idle mode, so you can enjoy building weapons anytime and anywhere.

name: Super Raft Boat Together
description: The world's been flooded. All you have left is your Super Raft Boat… and your friends! Work together to expand your raft while fending off the strangely violent (and wealthy??) creatures of the sea in this multiplayer roguelike shooter. Will your crew survive and reach the Final Island?

name: Remnant II
description: Remnant II is the sequel to the best-selling game Remnant: From the Ashes that pits survivors of humanity against new deadly creatures and god-like bosses across terrifying worlds. Play solo or co-op with two other friends to explore the depths of the unknown to stop an evil from destroying reality itself. To succeed, players will need to rely on their own skills and those of their team to overcome the toughest challenges and to stave off humanity’s extinction.

name: Tower of Chaos
description: Tower of Chaos is a tactical autobattler with roguelite elements, set in a dark fantasy universe. Explore procedurally generated worlds, place utility buildings, take control of your units, and fight your way through the tower to save your daughter's soul.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Ruin
description:
You can run, but you can’t hide…

Enter the ruins of Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex in the FREE story DLC for Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach!

Gregory is once again trapped in the now abandoned Pizzaplex, and he needs your help! Play as Cassie, Gregory’s best friend, Faz-fanatic, and would-be savior as she braves the dark, dreary, and dilapidated pizzeria. Armed with only a Faz-Wrench, a Roxy-Talky, and this weird bunny mask, you will have to help Cassie find her friend, free him, and safely escape the ruins.

Can you save your friend, yourself, and the Pizzaplex? Find out in the 100% free DLC, Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach – Ruin.

name: The Queen's Gambit Chess
description: This game features lessons, puzzles, and matches that can be played against real opponents or AI characters based on individuals from the show. Take some lessons from Mr Shaibel, play matches against Borgov or compete against friends in this love letter to the show.

name: Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner
description: Crimson Tactics: The Rise of The White Banner brings you an epic adventure in the form of a turn-based tactical RPG. Set in a medieval high fantasy world, witness a massive political disruption through the lives of different characters and fight for the fate of Wendalle.

name: Whispers in the West
description: Untangle thrilling mysteries by exploring the merciless and lawless Wild Western town of Brimstone. You and your friends need to collaborate, interrogate the town's residents and piece the clues together to solve the mystery!

name: The Black Pepper Crew
description: Use your wit to plan and execute bounty hunting jobs around the city on this tactical turn-based roguelite. Hire new crew members, gather loot and strategize on this minimalist take of the tactics genre.

name: Miss Inconspicuous Maid Girl Cleaning Co.
description: Welcome to Miss Inconspicuous Maid Cleaning Co.! Follow (or decide) the story of Ellie, a completely normal girl in a completely normal society, in this completely normal job!

name: The Daily Dozen Trivia
description: 9 new trivia questions every day! Select a square, guess an answer, and repeat. When your 9 guesses are completed, you get ONE "Double Dip" extra chance on any incorrect guess.

name: Football Quiz 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: PyRunner
description:
Welcome to PyRunner, an endless-runner game where you join PyGuy in a fun and challenging adventure to retrieve his dropped pies! Help him navigate through a shut-down highway, filled with obstacles and... other stuff...

Collect Pies: PyGuy needs your help to gather as many pies as he can. The more pies you collect, the higher your score and the more options you have to unlock W features.

Slide Under Obstacles: Test your reflexes and agility as you slide under barriers and fences to avoid obstacles that come your way. Quick thinking is the key to success!

Avoid Cars: Beware of cars passing through! Dodge the oncoming vehicles. slide through narrow gaps to keep PyGuy safe on his pie-retrieving mission.

Trade Pies for Unique Power-Ups: Exchange your collected pies for awesome power-ups. Activate a shield for protection, slow-down time, and more!

Customize PyGuy: Show off your style by customizing PyGuy with various outfits. Pick look that fits your style as you run through the highway.

Compete for the Highest Pie Count: Get as much as you can. If you think you have enough, you are mistaken.

Join PyGuy on his thrilling adventure in PyRunner! I mean, it's a guy running for pies. How dare you pass? Download now and help him reclaim his dropped pies. It's time to run, slide, and collect your way to victory! Are you up for the challenge? Let's get started!

name: Danganronpa Daydream
description: A fan game of the Danganronpa series made in Korea.

name: A Dark Place
description: Tiny horror visual novel.

name: Don't Rock The Boat
description:
An interactive horror story by elliot degrassi

A women's crew team plagued with internal debate over who is allowed to row in their league finds themselves stalked by a river monster.

This is a story for mature audiences. Content warnings: transphobia, implied sexual assault (off-screen).

name: Argus: Urban Legend
description:
Argus: Urban Legend is an interactive horror thriller mystery game, it is YOUR story. Your decisions do not only affect the course of the game but also the ending of this thriller.

Communicate with different characters via a messenger. Unravel the dark secrets surrounding ARGUS and other urban legends.
It's up to you to collect clues, solve puzzles, and stop the horror.
But watch out because you can't trust everyone…

name: Ghoul League
description: "Ghoul League" is a doomsday treasure brush shooting game. Any corpse ghost seen in the game can be caught against humans. "Two person game is the future". The game also supports multi person mode. You can break through customs and brush suits with your partners!

name: 911: Prey
description: Search items and solve puzzles to escape from the cannibal's plate. Cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything.

name: Atrophy
description: Atrophy is a boom-compatible map which heavily focuses on atmosphere and exploration. It takes around 30 minutes to beat on first playthrough. Difficulty-wise it should be accessible to most players who've played pwads before, although it can kill you if you're not careful.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Character Pass 2
description:
Character Pass 2 contains three DLC Character Packs, each containing three playable characters, for a total of nine playable characters!

Includes:
- Character Pack 4: The Battle of Onigashima Pack
- Character Pack 5
- Character Pack 6
- One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 Onigashima Battle Law Costume (Character Pass 2 Bonus)

name: Wordward Draw
description: Explore 4 letter words.

name: MiniLife: Tournament
description: Build your village under a hail of gunpowder barrels and bombs. Collect resources and defend against enemy sieges. Destroy enemy fortifications with combat llamas and mega mechs. MiniLife: Tournament is a cooperative game where only teamwork leads to victory!

name: DCS World: UH-1H The Huey Last Show Campaign by SorelRo
description: The Huey Last Show is a story-based campaign that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot, in 15 missions you will be facing various challenges and various missions while confronting the forces of the Soviet Union.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Mean Beans: Manly Hat Pack
description: Fight your friends in style with these 15 crazy hats!

name: Mean Beans: I Paid Money For This Pack
description: The most exclusive bean drip there is! Show everyone you spent $20 of these sweet tricked-out bumper cars!

name: Mean Beans: Party Hat Pack
description: Drown your bean in some sweet drip with these 15 awesome cosmetics!

name: Mean Beans: Gotta Have It Hat Pack
description: Drown your bean in drip with these 15 crazy hats!

name: Alfredo's Sneaky Meal
description: Alfredo's Sneak Meal is a stealth platform arcade game where, armed only with a frying pan, you have to help Alfredo get his meal in a building full of zombies and bats.

name: The Frozen Garden
description: The Frozen Garden is a third-person horror game inspired by classic survival horror that will immerse you in an intriguing and unsettling world.

name: Cooking Pix
description: CookingPix is an online cooking card game for 1-5 players.You can enjoy simple yet deep strategy building and bargaining.You can play many times in a short time, so even people who don't have time can enjoy it easily!

name: Hidden Kingdom: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Orz
description: You are at point 0. Therefore, you need to go to point 1.

name: Idle Worlds
description: An idle game with unique gameplay features. Travel between 8 different worlds and upgrade local generators to increase your profit. Use unique upgrades system to boost your stats or discover even more interesting prestige system to maximize your profit.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Furries 2
description: Poly Jigsaw: Furries 2 is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute furry.

name: Don't Lie Pack 2
description: Collection of epic games where sincerity is the key to conquer Do you dare to face this memorization game?

name: Don't Lie Pack 1
description: Collection of epic games where sincerity is the key to conquer Do you dare to face this memorization game?

name: Return
description: A game where you defeat aliens in a space station contaminated by alien invasion and solve puzzles to escape to Earth.

name: Sakura Bunny Girls
description: An action visual novel with a splash of fanservice about a security guard who gets entangled with three mysterious, attractive, seductive bunny girls who just so happen to have superhuman powers.

name: Driving Strikers
description: Driving Strikers is a 2.5D car football extravaganza in a 90s-style! Play 4-player matches across 5 different stadiums with wildly different and beautiful environments!

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Rashid
description:
Rashid is the first DLC character for Street Fighter 6 and the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass. The character was released on July 24th, 2023.

Capcom describes him as following:
”The Soaring Eagle of the Desert” that fights using parkour. With the wind as his ally, he outfoxes opponents with his high mobility. Born into nobility, he's a carefree but earnest man. Loves video streaming.

name: Knights of the Throne
description: Lasha is the leader of the Knights, a young woman of honor and strength. Deadly with a blade and pure in her heart, she will volunteer to take on a perilous path to protect the kingdom from an army of enemies never seen before.

name: Asura's Trial
description: Learn new skills based on simple key combinations in this easy to learn, hard to master adventure RPG. Combine over 100 different skills from 5 diverse classes to create an unbeatable combination and reclaim your body by finishing Asura's Trial.

name: Mean Beans
description: Do you ever dream about beans fighting to the death? Well now you can live the dream! Mean Beans is a free Battle Royale FPS where the last legume standing wins!

name: Phantom Matrix
description: Phantom Matrix is a theatrical, physics-based puzzle VR game. Armed with your wits and the dual magnetic pistols, it’s time to save your friends.

name: Ikkarus and the Prince of Sin
description: Play as Ikkarus, a legendary warrior in a journey for reputation, in this JRPG game about battling big guys and creating bonds of friendship and love with them later.

name: Weed Runner
description: Weed Runner is a drug dealing, crime fueled, story driven, point and click adventure.

name: Music Store Simulator
description: With Music Store Simulator you can lead a musical instruments manufacturing company. Create, sell, earn and reinvest improving and developing your business. Expand your Brand and climb to success in order to become the world's largest manufacturer of musical instruments!

name: Principle of Karma
description: Principle of Karma - Birth-Life-Death-Repeat

name: Furquest
description: A cute and cozy RPG where every enemy has their own unique minigame, and where there are two sides to every soul: Main and Invert!

name: Spectre
description: Employ stealth tactics as the Spectres, or defend your objectives as the heavily armed Reapers in this thrilling teamwork-driven multiplayer action experience!

name: Time Bandit: Part 1 - Appendages of the Machine
description: A darkly comic life sim that unfolds slowly in real time. Manage your money, fuel, and energy while slowly solving puzzles to collect the time crystals and then pull off high-stakes stealthy heists. Steal back time from your employer in this anti-capitalist melodrama, told through lowpoly cutscenes and radio conversations inspired by classic cinematic games.

name: Super Catboy
description: Super Catboy is an action-packed platformer in a high-bit pixel art style which combines the best elements of the golden 16-bit platformer era of the 90s - enhanced with new ideas! But most importantly: cat content!

name: Almastriga: Relics of Azathoth
description: An erotic 2D Action-RPG, Almastriga will have you explore, fight, and seduce your way through an army of eldritch evil.

name: Space Cats Tactics
description: Fight nerve-wracking spaceship battles in this turn-based tactical space opera RPG! Manage your crew of feline warriors to adapt to every strategic situation and dive into a thrilling space opera story where your choices will determine your path.

name: Offroad Mechanic Simulator
description: Service off-road vehicles and take them for a drive! Offroad Mechanic Simulator lets you modify many classic off-road vehicles and prepare them for daunting tasks that no normal car could ever hope to complete. Test your work and climb steep cliffs or drive through rivers and deep layers of mud.

name: Tsukisas Arena
description: The simplest and deepest competitive action game set in a water tank. There is an only one law, "Stab with pointy head" !!

name: Smash Dungeon
description: Smash Dungeon takes inspiration from arcade classics to bring you procedurally generated dungeon mayhem. Fight your way through the dungeons on your own or co-op, killing everything in your path to claim the riches below.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Posters In The Train Car
description: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: People In A Train Car
description: This add-on adds a girl and a guy to the passenger car of the train.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Beer On The Train
description: The add-on adds beer bottles, 3 pieces, to the passenger train car.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Flashlight
description: The add-on adds a regular flashlight with which you can find something interesting in the game

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Instant Arrival In Novosibirsk
description: This add-on allows you to instantly get to the main goal in the game - the train station in Novosibirsk.

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Personal Computer In The Apartment
description: An old personal computer appears on a table in the character's apartment

name: Russian Train Trip 3: Gorbachev's Posters In The Apartment
description: Posters of Soviet President Mikhail Gorbachev will appear in your apartment.

name: Elysian
description: Elysian is where reality and virtual combat blur. In this heart-pounding FPS, only the strongest and most strategic players prevail. Choose your path: adrenaline-fueled skirmish battles against skilled opponents, or test your limits in the unforgiving Survival Mode. In skirmish, master cutting-edge weapons and futuristic tech to outmaneuver rivals on dynamic battlefields. Survival Mode: face relentless enemies, each wave more formidable than the last. Push yourself to survive. With stunning visuals and responsive gameplay, Elysian immerses you in a world where the line between game and reality dissolves. Join the fight and prove your worth in this unforgettable FPS experience.

name: Abnormal State: Otome Love
description:
Summertime is here, and so is the love of your life!

In this otome game, you'll wake up in a certain game and find yourself surrounded by three guys who want you. But there's a catch: you'll die if you don't find true love!

name: Scary Wife Chapter 2
description: Hello, welcome into the Scary Wife Chapter 2, a love simulation horror game that will challenge your perception of reality. As you awaken in your neighbor house, there is a mysterious yandere girl who claims to be your new wife. However, you possess no recollection of this marriage, yet her enchanting beauty initially lulls you into a false sense of security breach.

name: Fried Chicken Nuggets and Angels
description: "Fried Chicken Nuggets and Angels" is a text based adventure game with the theme of a detective story.
