The killer "Rooster" who killed six innocent girls has committed a new crime.Fortunately, at the scene of the seventh homicide, the police found important clues pointing to the murderer...

name: Russian Train Trip 3
description: A first-person adventure game with a deep plot. You have to get from Tyumen to Novosibirsk on a passenger train. You can look out the window and watch the changing nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

name: Save My Sister
description: After a young girl is kidnapped by a human trafficking gang, an ex army officer with PTSD has to fight to rescue her. A Third Person shooter with film-noir/neo-noir style

name: Project B-Fer
description: A short puzzle/escape room game where you can choose between engaging with the puzzles, or breaking through them.

name: Witch's
description: An evil witch has taken over the kingdom and you're the only one who hasn't been hit by the curse! Be yourself the savior of Farheim!

name: Escape Condition
description: A time-travel adventure RPG with multiple endings that asks: How do we move forward without repeating the mistakes of the past?

name: Resident Evil: Seamless HD Project
description: Time to re-experience this classic survival-horror game with Machine Learning upscaled backgrounds, seamless masks and many other small improvements in this all-in-one texture pack.

name: Luigi's Requiem
description: Luigi Is Lost in this haunting Nightmare! Can you escape or will you be lost in your mind forever!!!

name: Combi Pool
description: A game where you hit pool balls against each other.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: The Alucard Moveset
description: A mod which adds Alucard as a playable character to Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, with a moveset based on Castlevania: Symphony of the Night.

name: WonderCell
description: This is a version of FreeCell for the Bandai Wonderswan - both mono and colour!

name: Destiny Maiden
description:
Destiny Maiden is a mobile card battle game with authentic TCG/CCG sensibility.
An online turn strategy card battle game, The coin system of unit cards that will be a variable in battle, Psychological warfare of invisible magic cards, With 6 hand cards and shuffling opportunities provided every turn Unleash a variety of powerful card combinations that can change the battlefield.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 5
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters. Ruby and Hunter just returned home from a date when they catch their naughty maid getting it on with her newest boyfriend on their terrace. They seduce the hot couple into letting them join the fun.

name: I Must Eat Chili Oil
description:
I miss her mapo tofu.

436 words. Lumpy and greasy.

name: You're Not Actually Supposed To Die (At The Tournament Of Death)
description:
You're stuck in a submarine with five ridicolously rich people. The submarine don't work good. What will you do?
I resisted the impulse of making this a dating sim btw. Which I should be praised for.
It's a game. I don't know what else to say about it. The bulk of it has been written while mildly sleep deprived.

name: Sex Campus Story 18+
description: Embark on an exciting adventure as the main character in "Sex Campus Story," a visually stunning adult visual novel. You play the role of an ordinary student from an ordinary family, living a mundane life.

name: Asteroidc
description: You're in control of a spaceship and your mission is to destroy as many asteroids as you can. Compete for the highest place on the Leaderboard.

name: Showgunners: Security Breach
description:
Showgunners first DLC - Security Breach - is out now!

Five new tactical combat arenas, a new map, a new elite enemy, and new unique weapons and abilities are included in this exciting new chapter. Oh, and it's free. And new.

We'll see you in the arena!

name: Spiky Way: Forest
description: Spiky Way: Forest is an arcade game, where you need to go through different obstracles. Navigate through a dense forest, avoid spikes, and unlock cute creatures as you test your skills in this addictive adventure.

name: Po-Go-No!
description: Po-Go-No! is a colorful and psychedelic arcade game where, on a pogo stick, you have to bounce between different floor tiles - each with different effects on your run and score points!

name: Hentai Crystals
description: Relaxing puzzle game for a good mood

name: Shroom & Doom
description: A top-down tower-defense game where you play as a little robot that has crash landed on an alien planet. Defend yourself against waves of bug-like enemies using towers made from the local mushrooms. Find a way to repair your ship and escape the planet!

name: PongBall
description: Do you remember one of the first game in the world ever made? We (re)made it in modern way! Use skills, open cases, get new skins, beat your opponents, play with your friends and much more in PongBall!

name: Vacation Paradise: Florida - Collector's Edition
description: Take a Vacation in Florida! Beautiful beaches, large lakes and exciting activities await.

name: Posthaste Emporium
description: Posthaste Emporium is a chaotic first-person shop management game where you must run your master's magical goods shop while he's off on vacation. You're responsible for stocking the shelves after the morning delivery arrives and sending all the customers' orders out on time before the shop closes.

name: Carry Onward
description: Carry Onward is a narrative gameplay short that follows a grieving man as he packs up his home. Immerse yourself in his thoughts and emotions by interacting with items, which shape his internal state. Experience the transformative power of memories and the hope that arises from embracing change.

name: Loretta's Brand New Job
description: Loretta's husband Elio has started a promising new job at a newspaper. However, a politician Elio used to work with is now coercing Elio to write positive articles about him, putting Elio's reputation at risk. To protect her husband, Loretta begins to look into this man's past...

name: Piero's Pilgrimage
description: An simple exploration game where you walk a dog.

name: Shy Cats: Hidden Orchestra
description: Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician cats that are embarassed to play their music. When you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Open Fishing XL
description: Open Fishing XL is an open world fishing game focused on creating a relaxing experience. Fill out a book with all of the 100 fish species, explore the large map, manage your cash to buy bait, enjoy the chill nature of fishing, and far more features planned in early access updates.

name: Sefirot Shards
description: Sefirot Shards - a turn-based strategy game with RPG and CCG elements, imbued with the spirit of classic fantasy.Plunge into a world where the gods are playing their deadly game. Gather a squad and solve all the secrets that Sefirot has prepared for you.

name: Squally
description: Squally is a 2D puzzle RPG game that teaches video game hacking -- WITHOUT boring lessons, lectures, nor the need for prior experience. Instead, Squally teaches hacking through fun engaging puzzles where learning is a by-product.

name: Legend of Edda
description: In Legend of Edda, players must choose sides between Olympus or Titans as they engage in PVP and RVR battles.

name: A House for Alesa 2
description: One year after the events of A House for Alesa (note: canon ending is ending F having kept your tongue intact), Alesa receives a call from a detective who confirms her worst fear: Mr. Bob and his family are back and they are coming for her. Will Alesa survive the night? How many more horrors must she endure? Is there another house of horrors waiting for her?

name: Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels - All Levels in a Row
description: Sin descripción

name: Everything's Fine
description:
Emily feels a lot more tired than usual. Ethan knows something's wrong, but his sister insists that everything's fine.

She says he can't go to the attic. She says that it's empty, and there's nothing interesting up there, but he knows he didn't imagine the fear in her eyes she gazed upon that locked door.

Emily's acting strange. He often hears her talking to herself in the bathroom at night, repeating over and over, that "everything's fine".

Isn't it?

name: Betterified VI: Bestified
description: The sequel to Betterified V and the final game in the Betterified series. Sin Man assembles a team of four villains in an attempt to take down Mario or Toad.

name: Ara Fell & Rise of the Third Power
description: Ara Fell & Rise of the Third Power comprises of both games on one physical cartridge

name: Moto Rush GT: Extended Edition
description:
Racers, beware!
One of a kind game entirely playable with... Toy-Con Motorbike!
Forget about speed limits and traffic rules 'cause on this road you're the boss!

name: Something in the Woods
description:
Something In the Woods is a short horror game that places you in the shoes of a Police Officer on a fateful night. While driving down a desolate road, exhaustion compels you to stop at an isolated gas station for a cup of coffee. However, as you step inside, you look at a board with dozens missing person posters and wonder who or what could have done this. An eerie silence pervades the gas station, devoid of any staff or customers. You need to find out where everyone has gone.

It's getting dark, better hurry.

name: Pulse Codex EP
description: Decode the control glyph and challenge strange entities in a short audiovisual composition / videogame hybrid.

name: Blights Wrath
description:
Hack and Slash RPG in the world of Zeontis.

Level up and improve your combat finesse with magic, melee arts and ranged skills.
Improve your armory with thousands of items and fight your way through the hordes of demons and undead to save Zeontis.

name: Animal Farm Parking
description:
Get ready for an exciting adventure at the lively Animal Farm! In Animal Farm Parking, you become the hero of the farm as you guide all the cute and lovable animals out of the crowded pen in the correct order, ensuring they don't collide with each other. Exercise your problem-solving skills and strategic thinking as you navigate through challenging levels filled with twists and turns. Can you create a path that leads each animal safely to its destination? With its charming graphics, immersive gameplay, and delightful animal characters, Animal Farm Parking is a must-play game for anyone who loves puzzles and animals.
Can you master the art of animal parking and become the hero of the farm?

name: Sword of Glory
description: Live, fight, die, upgrade, repeat!

name: Gutter: The Reject
description: Play the role of a failed experiment in this hazardous new mini-campaign.

name: Trade City
description: Trade City is a simple city building game that you build your own city by building/developing new buildings.Grow your city with production and trade, and conquer other cities on the map without fighting.

name: Syzygy: The Power of the Eclipse
description: "The syzygy is the alignment of the sun, moon and earth, which only occurs every 300 years. During that time, the gods are "mortal". They lose almost entirely that which makes them invincible, and a serious wound is capable of making them succumb... to death."

name: Platform Game Maker
description:
Platform Game Maker is exciting tool to make your dream Platformer Game!
You can choose from many many pre-made blocks, sprites and other 2D assets and place them in your levels, and then add several different type of monsters to play and test your own levels.
Choose different backgrounds and ornamental sprites to populate and visually enhance your levels.
There are several main characters to choose from, each can be the hero of your levels
You can also add many health pick-ups, different obstacles as well.
Place check-points if your levels are too difficult to complete in one run.
Don’t forget to put your end-level award at the end of your levels!

name: Away Times
description: It's a vampire survive-like game where you survive running away from monsters. If you can survive for 30 minutes, you can win. When a crashed gray man lands on a strange planet, you are very curious about where this is. But first you have to survive hostile creatures.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition includes the Base Game and the following DLC: Standard Cosmetic Set, Premium Cosmetic Set, Starter Set and SSS Summer Splash Set.

name: Bambie
description: Enjoy an approachable erotic simulator that boasts immersive character physics and supports on-the-fly changes. Gameplay is quick to pick up and hard to put down. Get up close and personal as you configure your Bambie doll into the perfect positions for a fashion-tastical climax!

name: Rocket Horizon
description: Rocket Horizon is a game where you control a rocket to dodge obstacles on different planets.

name: Lost Forest
description: Experience the beauty of nature and embark on a serene adventure in Lost Forest. Uncover the mysteries, find solace, and immerse yourself in this enchanting world. Are you ready to get lost?

name: Only One Way Up
description: Reach new heights in a mysterious world above the clouds, full of secrets to explore. Ascend on your journey and get as high as possible in Only One Way Up! Step up into a realm way above the clouds..

name: The Trade Prince
description: The Trade Prince is a logistical economic simulation game in which you build automated trade networks across multiple planets to produce increasingly complex goods.

name: 20 Doors
description: 20 Doors is an exploration, action and puzzle solving adventure where strange events and environments make you question your sanity.

name: Police Cop Hot Pursuit
description: The Chase is On: Police Hot Pursuit!

name: Heros and Monsters
description: Auto Battler, Clicker, Idle Game

name: Bloodecay
description: In the Land of Elworth, a plague called erosion emerged. It corrupts all life, brings pain and destruction ---- Becoming the knight idonia, who accepts the bloodthirsty brand, annihilat the plague claws, and destroy the ancient evil.

name: Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition
description:
In Dessert DIY: Nasty Edition you can make desserts and seek sweet revenge!

Unlock mean ingredients to create desserts with a nasty surprise for the bad guys. Imagine adding cockroaches, ants, worms, and other yucky things to your ice cream and popsicles!

name: Mad Way
description: Mad Way is a game where you have to climb a strange universe without falling to find your love!

name: Super Dinoblasters
description: B3RN1 (Bernie) is a patrol bot with the Intergalactic Federation, tasked with keeping the galaxy safe from would-be villains. After receiving a distress signal from Galactic Blast Ranger Pink, B3RN1 changes course to investigate planet Cretacia.

name: Contraptions 3
description: Contraptions 3 is a physics based puzzle game with a fun cartoony look and feel to it.

name: Ramp Car Racing
description: Get behind the wheel and let the thrill begin!

name: The Envolution of Wandaland
description: A minimal puzzle game, combine the cells and then piece together various creatures

name: Classified: Death in the Alley
description: Do you have what it takes to uncover the killer? Find out in this hidden object game with evidence processing and suspects interrogation!

name: Koi Zen: Opposite Colors
description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant and tranquil puzzle game, featuring elegant koi fish to enhance your gameplay. Take control of both the white and black pieces to paint the board with amazing colors.

name: Classic Pool and Cyber Pool Bundle
description: This bundle offers a thrilling and immersive pool experience, allowing players to test their skills and enjoy the best of both worlds.

name: My Klutzy Cupid
description: In the midst of leading an ordinary life, I began to feel the urge to find myself a girlfriend. Yet somehow, I couldn't bring myself to take the first step. But one day... "What's this...?" A single notebook had fallen right in front of me. "Hey, you! Yes, you! Why aren't you picking it up?"

name: The Voyager
description: After working all your life you have finally managed to build a device that allows you to travel between parallel worlds. will you be able to return home?

name: Catch The Fox
description: It's a massive game of tag, who will win?

name: Dream Ploy Will
description: This is a 1V1 game, including round system, war chess, and strategy play. You can freely match your deck, command heroes, summon monsters, and release spells! Compete with game friends or strangers!

name: Chester: Into the Light
description: Your once favorite plush toy now torments your mind. Find your way out of the nightmares each night, and bring your fears into the light.

name: Forge Industry
description: Forge your destiny as a blacksmith! Automate your workshops, optimize your supply chain, research new materials, craft legendary weapons, and cast your place in the world.

name: The Many Deaths of Lily Kosen
description: A demon is trying to kill you and your friends, and it's all that you can do to survive. How can you stop it permanently? How many of your friends have to die before it's all over? Try and make the best choices you can in this pulse-pounding horror visual novel!

name: Epicenter VR
description: Save the last survivors after a deadly zombie virus has taken over your island home. Protect those closest to you at all costs and evacuate before supplies run out.

name: Hurricane chase
description: Hurricane chase is a multiplayer (4vs1) Sports game where one player takes on the role of the Tornado, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to destroy the weather controllers or attack the Tornado and avoid being destroyed.

name: Rings of Saturn
description: The unexpected discovery of valuable minerals within the rings of Saturn has sparked a thriving space excavation industry. Experience hard sci-fi, top-down space simulator, with every aspect backed up by real physics and science.

name: RC Boat Simulator
description: RC Boat Simulator is the reference radio-controlled boat simulators. On a lake or a pond, put your Yacht, Sailboat, Speed Boat, Ferry or radio-controlled water and discover multiple HD environments.

name: Gym Empire
description: Gym Empire is a gym simulation and management game. You take on the role of a personal trainer trying to make ends meet training clients in your garage. Build your way up to number one on the block, the city, the country and the world by building your Gym Empire how you want. Will you make a commercial gym or specialise in a certain field? Will you focus on training clients yourself or hire staff to train clients while you focus on managing your Gym Empire? The choice is yours.

name: Pikmin 4
description:
Meet Pikmin, small, plantlike creatures you can grow, pluck, command, and overpower your enemies with! These curious helpers come in different types—fire is no sweat for Red Pikmin and the brand-new Ice Pikmin can freeze enemies and the environment. Use your Pikmin’s miniature might (and a bit of strategy) to explore this mysterious planet.

You get a dog, too! Oatchi, resident good boy and dependable partner, can help with things like smashing obstacles and carrying Pikmin throughout your adventure. With the miniscule Pikmin and a capable canine in tow, no challenge is too big!

name: Paraiso
description: Get the cup of immortality and escape the temple with all the treasures you can find!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario "Brotherly Revolt"
description: The "Fool of Owari" succeeds his father, and challenges the world. Additional scenario available for "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Awakening. Select "New Game", and choose "Brotherly Revolt" to play the scenario.

name: Gem Jam
description: You've found a warehouse with more rooms than you can count, each with a crate full of gems. The only snag is that the gems are packed in amongst tons of other boxes. You'll need to shuffle things around so that you can bring the gems to the exit and get rich.

name: How the Little Match Girl Met the Queen of Vampires
description: The little match girl plays a magical flute.

name: U C U B E
description: Sin descripción

name: FNaF 4 Retro Edition
description: This is a complete recreation of FNaF 4 in an 8-bit art style!

name: Red Line
description: Moving into a shabby apartment, a saturnine girl with hidden secrets finds a notebook that allows her to communicate with another world. A thrilling adventure taking place across multiple timelines ensues.

name: Maska
description: Sin descripción

name: Lighthouse Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Random Acts of Madness
description: Run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness, rushing along the sky trail to rescue the precious Royal Offspring held within each increasingly difficult lair. It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart, so react quickly to the onslaught of obstacles that block your path forward in Random Acts of Madness!

name: International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus
description: The project will be the final evolution of a definitive ROM for the game, bringing unprecedented gameplay improvements and maintaining the already consolidated improvements in skills with team characterization (Jorge Guimarães) for the use of the game in online competitions: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus”, modification based on the previous project: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (SA)”.

name: Cosmic Salvage
description: Embark on an interstellar journey in 'Cosmic Salvage,' a thrilling 2D platformer game made in Unity. Become the intrepid astronaut who crash-lands on an enigmatic and treacherous alien planet. Stranded far from home, you must navigate through perilous landscapes and cunning adversaries to retrieve the vital components needed to reignite your plasma engine.

name: Minna de Kuuki Yomi Koro-koro Comic Ver.
description: Sin descripción

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Challenge Dungeon Collection
description:
The Challenge Dungeon Collection includes:
- Challenge Dungeon "Hellfire Lair"
- Challenge Dungeon "Sunken Ruins"
+ 4 save slots (adds 4 additional save data slots)

name: NightmareScape: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- Digital Artbook
- Deluxe Edition Exclusive Outfit
- Deluxe Edition Exclusive Bikti Variants Appearance
- Clothing Exchange Coin x1, to exchange for outfits unlocked through achievements in the game

name: World of Machines: Tanks War Operation
description: World of Machines - Tanks War Operation is an immersive tank warfare game that thrusts you into the heart of epic battles across diverse landscapes and environments. Take control of a wide array of formidable tanks, explore different locations, tackle challenging missions, and customize your vehicles with unique camouflages. Prepare for intense armored combat and become a legendary commander on the front lines.

name: Salamander Capital
description:
Mud and metal and the smell of rotting in humidity. A visual novel by Lichen Euchella.
A submission for Visual Novel Cup 2, 07/2023.

name: The Moon Looks Beautiful Tonight
description:
A game about fear of the unknown.

A year ago, the Moon was sent violently flying off course by a catastrophic explosion, depriving Earth of its steady stream of resources. Less importantly, the two maintenance workers on there when the explosion occurred have been stranded ever since.

It's not so bad, honestly. The Heart provides for everything, a practically infinite source that gives them water, food, and powers their satellite as they wait with ever dwindling hopes for rescue. Really, it's boring, but there's no reason to stress out so long as-

The Heart has stopped.

name: Paint by Pixel 3
description: Unleash your creativity and paint your way pixel by pixel!

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Castles And Palaces 5
description: Magnificent architecture and valiant warriors! Put the puzzles together and enjoy the atmosphere of the royal domain.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Regions Mode
description: Learn local regions and their capital cities.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Landmarks Mode
description: Learn the location of famous landmarks around the world!

name: Capitals Quizzer: Currency Mode
description: Teach yourself the currencies of the world.

name: Lakeburg Legacies: Supporter's Pack
description: Show your support to the developers and get exclusive portraits and clothes for your villagers, as well as the OST and a digital artbook for the game!

name: Magic Kaleidoscope
description: The Magic Kaleidoscope is an amazing anti-stress coloring game where you can become the creator of your own magical textures and animations.

name: Aikokuryuu no Memoria
description: A Japanese, indie RPG.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EGLL Airport
description: A major international airport in London, England. Heathrow Airport is used by over 80 airlines flying to 185 destinations in 84 countries. The airport is the primary hub of British Airways and is a base for Virgin Atlantic. It has four passenger terminals and a cargo terminal.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Countries Mode
description: Every capital of every country, with national flags.

name: Deceive Inc.: Neon Nights
description: Agent Hans gets a rude awakening when the ex-henchman who cut off his arm comes out of retirement! With his days of villainy behind him, new agent Sasori aims to bring Deceive Inc. into the future of corporate espionage.

name: Autofading Se Disparaître
description: This work uses virtual reality and non-linear sound composition technologies to poetically explore the presence of human beings in their environment. Immersed in a forest generated by point cloud data, which evolves according to their observational attitude and type of attention they give to it.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Super Deluxe
description: Play the official video game of Catan on Console! On a board that comes to life, challenge friends locally or play the AI, then take these skills online with full cross-play compatibility! The Super Deluxe edition includes The Helpers, Championship Maps, Dice Skin & Hex Frames.

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance
description: Lead the German offensive and stand at the head of the Red Army in Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance, a set that includes campaigns from the games Strategic Mind: Spectre of Communism and the previously unavailable Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles
description: "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" bring the whimsical world of gnomes to life! Discover the magic as you assemble pieces featuring vibrant, enchanting gnome realms. Ideal for both kids and adults, these puzzles offer a unique blend of challenge and charm. Perfect for a cozy evening indoors!

name: Hello Girl
description: Hello Girl is visual novel about connection and disconnection. It's about the love of places and the futility of trying. It's about knowing your place, yet still feeling lost.

name: Arcade Archives: King & Balloon
description:
"KING & BALLOON" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1980.
Shoot down the swarms of balloons that are coming to steal the king!
The game will continue so long as the king isn't fully taken away into the sky, no matter how many times your cannon is destroyed.
You can also rescue the king as the balloons take him by shooting them down and rescuing him before he goes away.

name: Yeah! You Want "Those Games", Right? So Here You Go! Now, Let's See You Clear Them!
description: Cute and comical stickman characters have arrived for you to enjoy "those games" you've seen and wanted to play before. Play a variety of minigames fully, thoroughly, and enjoyably to your heart's content!

name: Forza Horizon 5: Summer Party
description: It's summertime in Mexico and you don't wanna miss this party! The Summer Party update brings longer night cycles, the new Icons of Speed story and new summer props to bring the chill over to EventLab.

name: Puzzle Together: Jigsaw Super Variety Pack
description: Unlock 20 puzzles depicting a wide variety of themes! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 20 unique puzzles (a $15 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 3 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Doctor Cat
description: Reflect as you have fun with stories about a group of cats who after being cornered by the problems in there lives decide to go to Doctor Cat. Solve adorable jigsaws while uncovering the story of there patients

name: Scratch Man
description: In this 2.5D obstacle dodging game Scratch Man is on a train home when he encounters his old enemy the Evil Squirrel, who has recently escaped from prison. After being knocked off the train it is up to you to dodge obstacles and catch up before it's too late.

name: PuzzleSquare
description: A Chinese traditional ink-style puzzle game.

name: Legends of the Eternal Flame
description: Embark on a perilous journey to rekindle the eternal flame and save the world that is falling into chaos.

name: The Kitty in The Spaceship
description:
The galaxy tour
For a huge fan of cats……
The ship is full of troubles!?

name: Surface Runner
description: A narrative driven-platformer that puts the player in the shoes of an AI that is becoming more and more sentient.

name: Magical Girl Dash
description: Magical Girl Dash is a retro arcade where you fight against the forces of evil in a runner style game. Protect the city and, most important of all, recover the stolen cakes from your favorite bakery!

name: Raptoid
description: Raptoid is a gay scaly bdsm themed beat-em-up game and an homage to the classic video games of the 90s, featuring lots of kinky game mechanics, enemy grapples and a fighting system that was was developed with empowerment and fun in mind.

name: Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR
description:
Delve into the depths of hell, where you will face an array of enticing challenges and encounters. The game deftly combines puzzle mechanics with meticulously crafted erotic scenes to deliver a unique gaming experience for mature audiences.

Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR invites the player into a visually stunning environment of unique atmosphere. The game deeply explores the abyss of desire, discussing dynamics of power and themes of submission, all woven into the game's hellish backdrop.

Immerse yourself in a world that breaks the boundaries of gaming and narrative. Succubus: Hellish Orgy VR is aimed at delivering a unique and captivating experience for players who appreciate adult content while maintaining artistic integrity.

name: Crowded Mysteries
description: Uncover the truth, solve the crimes, and become the ultimate detective!

name: Twist & Turn
description: A puzzle-platformer game in which your character is always rotating

name: SpaceMine
description: SpaceMine is a third-person tower defence game where your mission is to defend your mining operation by building towers and barriers to hold off waves of local fauna and collect enough resources to meet the company's quota.

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Malignant
description:
Corruption has befallen Sanctuary in Season of the Malignant, the first Season of Diablo IV. A deviant form of Lilith’s sinister machinations has given birth to a new threat, Malignant Monsters. These decaying abominations roam Sanctuary in a frenzy, mindlessly attacking anyone in range without hesitation. Wanderers will investigate this mysterious malady in a new Questline with the help of Cormond, a former priest of the Cathedral of Light, who also trains you to capture the Malignant Hearts fueling these foul beasts and convert them into build-altering powers. The malignancy that’s taken hold of the Burning Hells’ armies cannot remain unchecked—you must snuff it out at the source before all of Sanctuary becomes its thrall.

As you hunt down Malignant Monsters for their build-enhancing Hearts and partner with Cormond to discover the source of the corruption, you’ll earn rewards from the Season Journey and Battle Pass.

The Season Journey is broken into Chapters with tasks to complete. As you progress through the Journey, you’ll earn rewards befitting Sanctuary’s defender, such as new Legendary Aspects, a Mastery Title, and a Scroll of Amnesia, which provides a free Skill Tree and Paragon Board reset. The Journey also provides Favor—the resource used to climb through the Battle Pass’ Tiers—which is also earned naturally by playing the game, whether it be killing demons, completing Quests, and more.

The Season of the Malignant Battle Pass begins on July 20, 10 a.m. PDT and hosts 90 Tiers, 27 Free Tiers and 63 Premium Tiers. Smoldering Ashes are earned from the Free Tiers, which can be spent on Season Blessings that provide you with a bonus to earning experience, Gold, or Obols depending on the Blessing you choose. The bonuses gained from Season Blessings only last until Season of the Malignant ends.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following:
- Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening
- Digital Officer Artbook
- Digital 40th Anniversary Commemorative Book
- Digital Complete Soundtrack
- Exclusive Scenario "Muskets Arrive"
- 40th Anniversary "Officer Face Graphics and Additional Traits" (six each)

name: Granny Remake
description: "Granny Remake" is a scary horror game where you must escape from a sinister Granny. Test your wits, stealth, and survival skills in an intense, immersive experience. Navigate through a terrifying environment, feeling the suspense at every step.

name: Wathitdew Record: Game Studio - Battlefield
description: Wathitdew Record presents a new turn-based arcade fighting game featuring four universes from Wathitdew Game Studio franchises!

name: MetaDude
description: Please connect, my user!

name: Monospaced Lovers: Prologue
description: Clara wakes up to a phone that isn't hers. Journey through an introspective, fantasy-filled land and save your world before it disintegrates in this metafictional platform-adventure game about closeness and distance.

name: AI Olympius
description: Join forces with rebels and their technologies to have a chance to restore freedom in a world that has fallen to the uncontrolled dominance of supreme artificial intelligence.

name: Devinica
description:
A corporate artificial intelligence simulator.

Deviniva is a first-person retro shooter set in a dystopian nonsensical city. Play through five levels set in apartments and warehouses and fight different enemies.

name: Grocery Grab
description: Active ragdoll speed running and multiplayer PVP couch party game

name: Inexplicable Geeks: RestoreTheMillerCut
description: The studio needs your help rewriting their next big superhero blockbuster for mass public consumption! What kind of movie will you make?

name: Whispike Survivors: Sword of the Necromancer
description: Cultivate the strongest monster in this horde survivor farming game! Fight against waves of creatures to beef up your Whispike and use its seeds to create even stronger hybrids!

name: Circle Killer
description: play the role of "circle" to avoid incoming blocks with rhythmic music now have two different levels Fall Level: Accompanied by dynamic music you will move freely around the area, avoiding falling blocks Traversal Level: You will continue traversing a section of road with rhythmic music

name: The Sims 4: Horse Ranch
description: Work hard and play hard with animal friends and your own stretch of land in The Sims 4 Horse Ranch Expansion Pack.

name: Sea of Thieves: The Legend of Monkey Island
description:
Split across three hilarious Tall Tales packed with secrets and side-quests, Sea of Thieves: The Legend of Monkey Island invites pirates to meet classic characters, in a new narrative that brings the iconic locations of Monkey Island to the Sea of Thieves.

The adventure begins on Mêlée Island, where pirates can take in the sights, smells and roguish splendour of the island as they seek to uncover why everyone suddenly seems to think quite highly of self-proclaimed mighty pirate, and known poodle pacifier, Guybrush Threepwood. Something's quite clearly wrong...

name: SpeedOverflow
description: Who is not obsessed with the passion and pleasure brought by speed? Never Stop, NEVER STOP!! LET SPEED OVERFLOOOOOOOOOOW!!!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Laser Lair
description: This is the first course in the Evil Lairs series of courses for Walkabout Mini Golf.

name: Knightmares
description: Face yourself in an epic tale of honor, courage and fusions. Knightmares will make you see fantasy from... A different point of view.

name: Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes - Definitive Edition
description:
Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes is a unique mix of puzzle, strategy and RPG: Plan your every move and combine your attacks to defeat your enemies in matching puzzle inspired battle scenarios, upgrade your heroes and creatures to unleash increasingly devastating attacks onto your opponents, and let the strategic thinker in you lead your troops to victory.

Originally developed by Capybara Games, Might & Magic: Clash of Heroes is getting a Definitive Edition including its DLC, refreshed character portraits, many quality-of-life improvements and an expanded, fully reworked and re-balanced online mode!

name: Zero Fire: Toaplan Arcade Garage
description:
Zero Fire includes Zero Wing and Hellfire, the collection will also include the Toaplan-developed side-scrolling run-and-gun bonus game Demon’s World.

Experience full ports of the Toaplan-developed side-scrolling shoot ’em ups Zero Wing and Hellfire, which first launched in arcades in the 1980s, complete with extras. Each game has a “Player 1 and Player 2 Alternating Version” and “Player 1 and Player 2 Simultaneous Play Version” with its own game balance adjustments. The overseas versions of each game are also playable.

Includes also new “Super Easy” and “Arcade Challenge” modes.

name: Run a Café
description: Run a Café is a game where you do just that, run a Café! Make drinks from regular coffee, to iced flavored coffees and even serve food! Manage your inventory and time efficiently to ensure you maximize every customer! Start from nothing and build a full scale, dine-in Café!

name: SGS Battle For: Stalingrad
description: The terrible "rat fights" (Ratenkrieg) fought out in the urban area of Stalingrad end of 1942, on a battalion scale and two days per turn scales. Relive one of the fiercest and deadliest battles in history, a ‘Hell in a Small Place’.

name: Airships: Heroes and Villains
description: Recruit captains, administrators, and sorcerers. Use their abilities to conquer the skies.

name: Ducky's Delivery Service
description: Propeller-powered duck delivery action! In Ducky's Delivery Service, you are a duck who uses a propeller backpack to fly around and deliver mail. Master the flight physics, grow your delivery business, fulfill special delivery requests from other ducks, and earn time attack ranks and high scores.

name: Abnormal Status: Tattoo, Prohibited Books, Parasites
description: In the present day, the majority of the human race has become capable of using magic. The sudden rise of this power has not been met with adequate laws and regulations, and the world is rapidly becoming a wasteland as crimes and discrimination intensify.

name: Train World
description: Train World is a railroad simulator that allows you to design, manage and operate your own railway network. Start at the dawn of railroad technology and evolve into a modern railroad company. Deliver cargo and transport passengers, open new regions and expand your network.

name: Dream Swing
description: Grapple and air-strafe your way to the top of the Leaderboard in this fast-paced movement-based time trial. Collect as many candies as possible within 5 minutes as you dip and weave around the ruins in the sky. Can you handle the speed?

name: Tile Town
description: A simple, yet challenging, relaxing strategy game set on a hexagonal grid. Place down individual tiles with various building to get the highest score possible, all while creating a picturesque medieval town in the process. Try to beat your previous score or go on a stroll in the first person mode.

name: Homeseek
description: Homeseek is a post-apocalyptic survival base builder placed at the beginning of the next century. There is almost nothing left of the Old World. Overpopulation, environmental exploitation, and complete disregard for nature resulted in the depletion of drinkable water by 2040. It took less than 15 years after that for the complete annihilation of our civilization. But a few lucky souls survived the destruction inside enormous bunkers. Now they have to get back to the surface and rebuild civilization.

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross
description: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross, a deck strategy game, is the fantastic adventure story of against with Teutonic Knights on the run across Europe at the dawn of Medieval period, which also includes diverse decks, random plots, ups and downs story.

name: Private Property
description: Private Property - the brand new VR zombie shooter set at the end of the XIX century Montana provides endless hours of great fun! This coop multiplayer allows players to team up to jointly defend the Private Property from hordes of Zombies.

name: Stillborn Slayer
description: Stillborn Slayer is a beautifully crafted pixel-art bullet hell RPG game set in a cursed Dark Continent, with challenging boss fights, exploration, and complex combat. Master dodging and rolling skills to fight incomprehensible monsters and slay the Horned God to end the Curse.

name: Snowbreak: Containment Zone
description: Snowbreak: Containment Zone is a science-fiction RPG-shooter. Players join the Heimdall Force to combat the mysterious Titans, giant creatures that ravage the world. You will witness how societies have fallen and discover the truth that is hidden beneath the snow...

name: Hellworld!
description: A story-driven 2D platforming game in which you possess your enemies and use their abilities to solve puzzles and make your way through the land of Hellworld.

name: Dros
description:
Discover the world of Dros, a beautifully detailed story-driven adventure about a slimy little creature and her human bounty hunter shell.

Little Dros and Captain both have different strengths and weaknesses and you’ll switch between them to solve puzzles, fight off enemies and sneak through a vast steampunk Tower.

The world of Dros features a fantasy story with a huge cast of odd and interesting characters to interact with. Unravel the mysteries within the Tower as you explore, unlock journal entries and collect strange alchemical treasures.

name: Oaken
description: Oaken is a tactical turn-based roguelike with deck management and 3D figurines. Explore the world of the Great Oak, gather allies and enhancements, learn to use the positioning and rotation for your advantage, choose how to upgrade your cards - all in order to restore the Oak's Song.

name: The Adventures of Bluke Bifton: Chapter 1
description: The Adventures of Bluke Bifton is a bizarre point-n-click adventure game set in a world of complete absurdity. Ally (or make enemies) with a cast of strange characters, and make choices that determine your fate.

name: Frank and Drake
description: Turn-based narrative experience about two housemates with different time cycles. A contemporary take on the classic novels of Frankenstein and Dracula.

name: Lakeburg Legacies
description: Lakeburg Legacies is a social-based village management sim focused on pairing up your townsfolk to make the best, most effective families in order for your kingdom to grow and thrive.

name: Eternal Return
description: Fend for yourself and defeat other survivors in unique and exciting top-down Survival Battle Royale gameplay. Become your favorite character and outlast your opponents by combining your wits and strategy with searching and item crafting to become the ultimate survivor.

name: Doomsday Hunters
description: Shoot stuff in a perfect pixel world, combine items, build guns, die every time! Roguelite twin-stick shooter where magic and post-apocalyptic future technologies collide. Defeat evil lord Dracula and save everyone!

name: Witch's Pranks: Frog's Fortune
description: You’ll be able to help yet another enchanted prince to reunite with his beloved princess Rapunzel, who was imprisoned in an inaccessible cave among waterfalls and her beautiful long hair was cut by the Witch.

name: Unholy
description: Open the doors between your everyday reality and a dark unholy world to unveil the mystery of the disappearance of your child. Explore both worlds to find clues, solve puzzles, decide whether you infiltrate or fight brutal enemies and stand up to an aberrant establishment.

name: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
description: You have come here to read game descriptions and play fighter management sims…and you’re all outta descriptions.

name: Pasapalabra
description:
The official Pasapalabra game, with the same format as the television program.

Face the same challenges as the program's contestants, you will have thousands of games on your mobile and you will be able to challenge players from all over the world.

name: Space Invasion
description: Destroy the waves of aliens before they descend to the surface and wipe out your ship.

name: Mumei ≠ Gura
description: Can you really claim to be their fan if you can't tell them apart?

name: Hopman
description: Sin descripción

name: Around us: Zombie shooter
description: Around us: Zombie shooter is a multiplayer cooperative zombie shooting game. There are various kinds of zombies and bosses. A lot of weapons and upgrades are waiting for you to unlock via waves. Try to survive the highest wave that no one ever reaches!

name: Tomorrow is my Birthday
description:
we don't have to do this
why don't we just leave?

There's a certain kind of coolness haunting this summer. And two friends want to run away from it. Get to know Petal, Bios and their summery secret.

The words you choose to say during this journey will decide its ending. Watch all the flowers closely. Breathe in the humid colors around you. Catch the essence of Petal and Bios' relationship. To escape this skewed reality.

A denpa Point-and-Click-Adventure about becoming a person, giving up, and a doomed friendship. And don't forget that you always can go home again.

When i’m near death i feel more real.
Do you feel real often in your life?
I forget... all the time.

name: Idolize
description:
Due to the evergrowing desire of the public to become closer to their favorite idols, the industry of celebrity bio-material has become a booming market! While helping in research, however, one celebrity starts to get very ill...

Help an unnamed idol recover from sickness and realize that they aren't alone.

name: Homo Ludus
description: Translated from rapid sub-supersonic squeaks clicks and whistles

name: Famous Crash
description: In a world, where women are gay for clout. One streamer breaks the rules.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: DreamSnaps Update
description: Summer is finally here – and so is new content for Disney Dreamlight Valley! Expect plenty of sweet surprises out of our DreamSnaps Feature Update, from a new Villager to new ways to earn Moonstones and other prizes. Vanellope, from Wreck-it Ralph, joins the Valley in this update.

name: Geo Gods
description:
Geo Gods is a solo card game which combines card drafting with a simple tile placing mechanic.
In Geo Gods you use the elemental magic of the Gods to create a godly garden. Each God faction comes with its own set of cards which you can strategically use to increase the score of each God. Activate the 6 elemental Power Crystals to gain even more score and create the perfect garden.

name: O-Void
description: Jump into the spinning circle of O-Void! In this super minimal action runner, you’ll be jumping over obstacles with the tap of a finger. But this is not a regular platformer! The entire level can change direction or flip upside down to throw you off. Are you skilled enough to survive every challenge?

name: Lost Crystals
description: Unearth the hidden gems waiting to be discovered in the foggy valley. Immerse yourself in the calm and let the magic of Lost Crystals wash over you. Are you ready to embark on a tranquil adventure like no other?

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Graffiti Tactical: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: WWE 2K23: Revel with Wyatt Pack
description: The Revel with Wyatt Pack includes the franchise return of Bray Wyatt, along with Zeus, Valhalla, Joe Gacy, Blair Davenport & bonus Superstar, Uncle Howdy. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card. The Revel with Wyatt Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: We Carry the Fire
description: We Carry the Fire is a fantasy-adventure visual novel about an apocalyptic curse, a magical forest, losing everything, and finding a reason to keep going.

name: Mémoire 0079
description: Mémoire 0079 is a narrative adventure game about exploring a wiki-like interface to uncover the secret history of a mecha war between earth and space in the uncomfortably not-so-distant future.

name: Metal Storm X
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping adventure in "Metal Storm X," a visually captivating 2D side-scrolling shooter!

name: Star Conflict: Edges of risk - Stage two
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage two”.Upon receipt, the next level is immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available7 days of premium license.

name: Star Conflict: Edges of risk - Stage two: Deluxe edition
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage two”.Upon receipt, the following 15 levels are immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available30 days of premium license.The ability to unlock three additional levels in the next Battle pass “Ancient instinct”

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross - Character Pack (Western Style)
description: Krzyżacy - The Knights of the Cross：Character Pack (Western Style) can replace the portraits and avatars of each character image in the game with one click

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Even Immortality Ends
description:
Version 1.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Blade, Kafka and Luka
• New main story quest: Topclouded Towerthrust
• New areas: Alchemy Commission and Scalegorge Waterscape
• New companion missions for Kafka and Yukong
• New events, including Tales of the Fantastic,Underground Treasure Hunt and Where Are You, Mystery Trotter?
• …and more!

name: Doomsday Jetlag
description: Arcade shooter at the end of the world! Play as fighter pilots fending off the aerial hordes of hell during total nuclear apocalypse, Doomsday Jetlag combines casual bullet-hell, shoot-em-up & rogue-lite elements to maximise the fun of playing through armageddon!

name: Shan Hai Express
description: Step aboard Shan Hai Express and experience an fantasy journey through the world of the ancient Chinese mythology Shan Hai Jing ( 山海经 ). This is an interactive narrative game inspired by the nonlinear structure of the text of "Shan Hai Jing".

name: NightmareScape
description: A port of In Nightmare under the name NightmareScape.

name: Kill Crab
description: Kill Crab is an underwater First Person Shooter, where you must complete combat challenges by killing aquatic vermin. The player will have to complete 4 combat challenges to escape. The game's theme is a combination of the wild west and underwater.

name: Ancient Wonders: Pharaoh's Tomb
description: The Pharaoh is dead and It's time to finalize the preparation of the Tomb. Play through more than 100 levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Tomb of the Pharaoh!

name: Cross Tails
description: What will the tails witness after a crossing tale? A tactical RPG that portrays a fantasy story of a war between the canine and the feline tribes playable from both points of view.

name: Agriculture
description: Grow crops as fast as you can in a frantic take on classic farming sim mechanics!

name: Demon Lord: Reincarnation
description: Assemble a party, explore the dungeon, fight your way through hordes of monsters, and defeat the Demon Lord in this brutal dungeon crawler. Are you up to the challenge?

name: DungeonSmash
description: A simple and addictive game where you break blocks in medieval dungeons.

name: Ａ Class
description: A romantic, adventure RPG.

name: Street of Secrets
description: A relaxing hidden object game. Explore unusual houses in search of secrets that their owners hide.

name: Asura
description: MMORPG 2D pixel game by a Thai development team that has been in service for over 15 years and is still developing continuously.

name: Let's! Revolution!
description: In Let's Revolution, embark on a deadly game of hide and seek as you decipher numbered clues to uncover the path to your goals. Chase down the cowardly King through the realms of Beebom while facing off against a host of enemies. Gear up along the way with powerful items and abilities for a final showdown in Beebom City.

name: Cantirium: God Slayer
description: A colorful metroidvania made in pixel art, where we have to help a cat girl save the whole world from inevitable death, and at the same time challenge the gods themselves!

name: Farsiders
description: 'Farsiders' is a top-down (isometric view) 3D action Hack-and-Slash RPG game set in a stylized futuristic cyberpunk world. Embark on a journey as 'Cassie' to the past with references to real world legends (Arthurian) where the worlds of sci-fi technology and medieval magic collide.

name: The Repair House
description: From the original creator of PC Building Simulator comes The Repair House! Discover and restore a range of objects in this relaxing restoration sim. Dismantle, clean, fix, customise and sell everything from musical instruments and antiques to games consoles, arcade cabinets and more!

name: Froggy's Battle
description: Froggy's Battle is an action roguelike game set in a loop. Help Froggy the steezy magician skater frog defeat all the baddies squatting her favorite riding spot. Choose your upgrades carefully, become more and more powerful and kickflip yourself through waves of enemies and ferocious bosses!
